Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 20 years ago, the @WorcesterFD courageously ran into a burning warehouse, & six brave firefighters didn’t make it out. Today we honor the Worcester 6, & we remember the sacrifice that all our firefighters make to keep us safe every day. #W6

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For far too long, big corporations have taken advantage of part-time workers with unpredictable work schedules – creating real hardships for them. My bill with @RepSchakowsky strengthens the rights, stability, & other protections workers deserve to build better financial futures.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act would:❌ Require big companies to offer available hours to part-time employees before hiring new employees/subcontractors❌ Make more part-time employees eligible for FMLA❌ Give part-time workers access to pension plans

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 2/3 of part-time retail & food workers want full-time work – but corporations often keep workers part-time to save on wages & benefits. @RepSchakowsky & I are introducing the Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act to boost protections for part-time workers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: All workers, including Harvard grad students, should have the right to organize & fight for better wages & working conditions. I've joined the entire MA delegation in urging Harvard’s leadership to negotiate in good faith with @hgsuuaw for a fair agreement.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Retail, fast food, & other hourly workers deserve some basic fairness when it comes to scheduling shifts. That’s why my #SchedulesThatWork Act with @rosadelauro would end some of the very worst abuses that hurt workers & families. #FairWorkWeek

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Holtec shouldn't be exempt from important emergency prep safeguards as it decommissions the Pilgrim Nuclear Power Station. The community has rightly raised important questions about the plant's decommissioning. They deserve answers, not more strong-arming.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: US military hardware in the hands of armed groups in Yemen violates US law & undermines our security. Glad that @StateDept & @DeptofDefense are investigating, but Saudi & UAE govts aren’t fully cooperating. I still think selling them arms is a bad idea.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: President Trump's trade-war-by-tweet with China is hurting cranberry farmers in MA & across the country. @SenMarkey, @USRepKeating, @RepJoeKennedy & I are urging the @USTradeRep to find new markets to compensate for China’s 40% tariffs on US cranberries.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This month, my POW/MIA Flag Act became law. Starting this week, you’ll see this Flag flying with the US flag over the Capitol permanently. This symbol must now be displayed daily at many federal sites across the nation so we never forget our servicemembers who didn’t return home.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Working families deserve a @CFPB that will get the tricks & traps out of credit cards & other financial products – & stand up to big banks, credit card & fintech companies when they cheat & discriminate. I’ll keep fighting to hold the CFPB accountable until it does its job.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In the 2 yrs they’ve controlled @CFPB, @MickMulvaneyOMB & @CFPBDirector have gutted its fair lending office, stripped it of exam & enforcement powers, & failed to file even 1 equal credit enforcement action. Could it be that banks know they can discriminate without consequences?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@CFPB’s job is to enforce fair lending laws & stop discriminatory financial products. @SenSherrodBrown & I want @CFPBDirector to explain how @GoldmanSachs’ @Apple Card slipped through when women who apply may get worse terms than men with similar credit.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our hearts go out to the crew of the F/V Leonardo, their loved ones, & to our entire fishing community in New Bedford. Fishing is more than a job or industry in MA – it's a family. We're grateful for the @USCG's tireless work today & every day.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: On International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, let’s reaffirm our commitment to ensuring women & girls worldwide can live free from violence. The US can show leadership by reauthorizing the Violence Against Women Act. #OrangeTheWorld #VAWA4ALL

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congrats to Boston Battery Wharf Hotel workers & @UNITEHERE26 for ratifying a new contract for better pay, affordable health care, fair scheduling, & protections from sexual harassment & discrimination. It was a tough fight – but when workers fight, workers win.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@SenMarkey & I are proud to see @EnergyCommerce pass our Leonel Rondon Pipeline Safety Act with @RepLoriTrahan as part of their SAFER Pipelines Act – & we’re grateful for good neighbors like @RepAnnieKuster who fight to help keep the Merrimack Valley & all our communities safe.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Access to millions of patient records gives @Google a huge resource to build AI systems & other tech – especially in light of news that Google is trying to buy Fitbit. Regulators & medical experts are right to have big privacy & competition concerns.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Medical records are extremely sensitive info that, when mishandled, expose patients to embarrassment, discrimination, & exploitation. Based on @Google’s prior privacy violations & security failures, we need to know how they’re handling patient data & for what purposes.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I'm concerned by reports that @Google collected personal health information from 50 million Americans without their consent. @SenBlumenthal, @SenBillCassidy & I want Google to explain “Project Nightingale” & how they’re planning to use this private data.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In the past decade, the @FederalReserve hasn’t denied a single bank merger application. It’s clear: the Fed works for the big, rich banks – and everyone else pays the price. Earlier this year, I told Chairman Powell: that needs to change.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The last thing our country needs is more Too Big To Fail banks. They put our entire economy – and working families – at risk.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Everyone has a right to live in a safe & affordable home. I’m glad to join @NydiaVelazquez’s bold effort to invest $70B in the Public Housing Capital Fund to wipe out the backlog of public housing maintenance & repairs caused by years of underfunding.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Glad the #HongKongHumanRightsDemocracyAct passed the Senate. I’m proud to be a cosponsor of this bill, which strengthens support for human rights & democracy in Hong Kong.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m concerned about private equity firms' investment in industries like nursing homes that care for seniors & people with disabilities & rely on government Medicaid & Medicare funding. That’s why I’ve got a bill to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity firms accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For-profit nursing home chains owned by private equity firms have more health & safety problems that put residents at risk. And the complicated ownership structure makes it hard for families to hold these homes legally liable for bad care.  #StopWallStreetLooting

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity firms have made big investments in big for-profit nursing home chains. @SenSherrodBrown, @RepMarkPocan & I are investigating their role in the declining quality of nursing home care. #StopWallStreetLooting

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Sorry for interrupting the party, @HHSGov – but before we spend more money to hang his portrait, can we get answers to our questions about whether Tom Price paid back taxpayers for his wrongful use of private jets on the taxpayer’s dime? https://t.co/6eziMyn1Fv

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Here’s the bottom line: private equity firms are putting millions of workers at risk by loading up companies with debt, stripping assets, & collecting huge fees. If the bets go bad, they walk away. I’ll keep fighting to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Ernst & Young’s industry-funded report paints a dishonest picture about private equity's effect on our economy. For example, when EY calculated private equity-owned companies’ avg wages, they included their Wall Street investors’ fat paychecks to skew the numbers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity will do anything to kill my #StopWallStreetLooting Act – even funding a sham study by Ernst & Young to defend the industry. @RepMarkPocan, @RepJayapal, @SenatorBaldwin, @SenSanders, & I want EY to explain their report's glaring flaws.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Toys “R” Us. Radio Shack. Payless Shoes. Sports Authority. Mervyn’s. Shopko. For far too long, private equity firms have destroyed retail stores & killed jobs, hurt workers, & drained our economy. We must #StopWallStreetLooting – & I have a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Devastating – and unacceptable. It's time for the @SenateGOP to stop working for the gun industry and start taking action to protect our children from senseless gun violence.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s true: our student loan system IS fundamentally broken. That’s why @WhipClyburn & I have a bill to cancel student loan debt for 42 million Americans. Our bill will help close the racial wealth gap & end the student debt crisis. #CancelMyDebt

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Dr. Johnson says that “repayment trends suggest much of the [student loan] debt will likely never be repaid,” but @BetsyDeVosED refuses to lift a finger to help our students. If @usedgov is sitting on info confirming Dr. Johnson's conclusions, the public deserves to see it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last month, one of @BetsyDeVosED’s top student loan advisors abruptly resigned, called the student loan system “fundamentally broken,” & announced his support for student debt cancellation. @WhipClyburn & I want to know how he came to that conclusion.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: MA residents want clean air & water & safety for their communities. They don’t want Big Oil & Gas swooping in to turn a profit by shipping natural gas overseas. I’ll keep fighting alongside South Shore families to keep a compressor station out of Weymouth.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our brave firefighters risk their lives every day to keep us safe, & it’s a tragedy when someone doesn’t make it home to their loved ones. My heart goes out to Lt. Menard’s family & friends, & the entire @WorcesterFD for their loss.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Valeria & her sister are woven into the fabric of our Commonwealth & our country. Their #HomeIsHere. I stand with our DACA recipients at the Supreme Court – and all of our Dreamers – who are fighting for the chance to build a future for themselves & their families. #HereToStay

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last week, I partnered with my colleagues on a bipartisan resolution urging the @USPS to commemorate some of the most courageous women veterans in our nation's history with a postage stamp series. It's one way we can honor their hard work & dedication.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: All 3 of my brothers served in the military, & I appreciate the sacrifices & contributions that our servicemembers, veterans, & military families make for our country. We are grateful for their service – on #VeteransDay & every day.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve worked hard in the Senate to improve the lives of our veterans & military families. I co-led a bipartisan bill to streamline the process for veterans to get commercial driver’s licenses. I’m glad it was signed into law last year.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Welcome back to Massachusetts, Ambassador @SenScottBrown and Gail! I know it will be good for New England Law Boston to have a dynamic leader.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: All 3 of my brothers came home safe after their service, but many do not. My bipartisan bill signed into law this week ensures that the POW/MIA Flag is prominently displayed & that we never forget our servicemembers who haven’t returned home.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@SenatorMenendez issued a report showing the Trump administration recklessly ignored the warnings of career @StateDept officials about ending humanitarian protections for TPS recipients from El Salvador, Honduras, & Haiti. More proof of this administration's heartless policies.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is disgusting. Eric Blankenstein’s racist writings disqualify him from a job at @HUDgov or any other government agency. He should have been fired, not rewarded with a big promotion.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Like a lot of parents in MA & across the country, I struggled as a young mom to find & afford quality child care. Today it’s even harder. I’m fighting for #UniversalChildCare so every family can afford care & child care workers are paid what they deserve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last month, I wrote a letter to the @StateDept & @DeptofDefense asking whether continuing to sell our military hardware to the Saudis & Emiratis is a good idea. (Hint: it’s not.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Step 1: Saudis transfer U.S. military equipment to Yemen.Step 2: UAE-backed separatist militia gets that equipment & uses it against Saudi-backed govt. Step 3: Saudis keep transferring more U.S. military equipment to Yemen. What could go wrong?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Before the @FCC approved the deal, T-Mobile execs spent $195k at Trump Hotels. This is what corruption looks like, & working families pay the price. My bill to #EndCorruptionNow would reduce the stranglehold that giant companies have over our government.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The US has a monopoly problem. In industry after industry, giant corporations get to play by their own political & economic rules, amassing unchecked power over people’s lives. And our government regulators would rather kiss up to them than use their tools to uphold the law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @FCC’s final approval of the T-Mobile/Sprint merger officially hands control of nearly 100% of wireless services to 3 corporate giants – strangling competition & harming consumers, workers, & small businesses.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Drug breakthroughs don’t happen by magic – they’re the result of generations of taxpayer investments. But in 2018, @NIH could only fund 20% of its research apps. The Medical Innovation Act is a powerful way to invest in the basic research that will save lives. #NIHSwearJar

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill requires giant drug companies that produce billion-dollar drugs & enter federal settlements to reinvest a portion of their profits in @NIH research as a condition of the settlement. I call it the #NIHSwearJar: if a drug company follows the rules, it won't pay the fee.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Giant drug companies caught breaking the law often get off with slap-on-the-wrist settlements. I’m reintroducing my Medical Innovation Act with @PeterWelch to increase @NIH & @US_FDA research funding by holding big pharma accountable. #NIHSwearJar

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is disgraceful. Federal funding for Historically Black Colleges & Universities expired more than a month ago, & @SenAlexander just rejected the #FUTUREAct to restore this critical funding. Again. Senate Republicans need to stop the games & fund our HBCUs & MSIs NOW.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realDonaldTrump’s withdrawal from the #ParisAgreement is a giant wet kiss to corporate polluters. I’m a cosponsor of @SenatorShaheen’s bill to stop President Trump’s withdrawal. The @SenateGOP should give that bill a vote.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad to work with @RosaDeLauro on the #SchedulesThatWork Act to help workers build some economic security for themselves & their families.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m especially proud to recognize Deborah Sampson from Plympton, MA, who disguised herself as a man to fight in the Revolutionary War & was the only woman to earn a Revolutionary Army military pension. Women veterans like Deborah Sampson should be honored for their service.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Women veterans are tough, smart, & have made incredible sacrifices for our country. I’m leading a bipartisan resolution with @LisaMurkowski, @SenMcSallyAZ, & @SenatorTester urging the @USPS to issue a postage stamp series commemorating historic women vets.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration will admit the lowest number of refugees ever – it’s heartless & wrong. We can admit vulnerable populations fleeing persecution & violence while keeping our country secure, healthy & prosperous. It’s not an either/or proposition.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My office found that a sanctioned Russian company with Putin ties received a tariff exemption, & most exemptions go to foreign-owned companies. The tariff exclusion process is one more way the Trump admin works for big, well-connected, & in many cases, foreign-owned companies.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @CommerceOIG report concluded: the Trump administration’s process for reviewing steel & aluminum tariff exemptions “is neither transparent nor objective.” In fact, the decisions “give the appearance that the Department officials may not be impartial.”

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Starting last August, I asked the @CommerceOIG to investigate @CommerceGov’s seemingly arbitrary & opaque process for exempting companies from Trump’s steel & aluminum tariffs. Their new report back confirms: the process was rigged from the start.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m grateful for @Pwr4PuertoRico’s support of my bill to give Puerto Rico & other disaster-stricken US territories a route to comprehensive debt relief & a chance to get back on their feet. It’s time for Congress to pass this bill.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Steven Menashi worked with @BetsyDeVosED to gut civil rights & consumer protections for students while at Trump’s Education Department, & @realDonaldTrump has rewarded him with a nomination to be a federal judge. The Senate should reject him. #StopMenashi

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I agree with @RepDebHaaland: the Chaco region is sacred & must be protected for future generations. I’ve supported legislation in the Senate to do that. The House should pass the Chaco Cultural Heritage Area Protection Act today. #ProtectChaco #ProtectTheSacred

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I join the Armenian American community in MA & the rest of the Armenian diaspora in celebrating the House passage of a resolution recognizing the #ArmenianGenocide. I cosponsored S.Res.150 to recognize this tragedy. The Senate should pass it now.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Sec. @stevenmnuchin1, you don’t work for Jamie Dimon & your Wall St buddies – you work for the American people. Do your job to protect our economy, explain what went wrong in the markets, & stop looking for excuses to roll back rules that help prevent another financial crisis.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Unbelievable. Former big bank executive turned @USTreasury Secretary @stevenmnuchin1 hasn’t even offered an explanation for the recent overnight lending rate spike, but he’s already using it as an excuse to weaken the rules on giant Wall Street banks.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The fossil fuel industry & their allies use armies of lawyers, lobbyists, front groups, & trade associations to rig the rules for dirty polluters. Tune in now to watch the @SenDemsClimate hearing on how dark money is blocking action on the #ClimateCrisis.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congrats to our Dedham teachers for voting to ratify a new contract yesterday after courageously going on strike. In MA & all across this country, teachers are fighting back & making their voices heard – & they’re winning. That’s how we make real change.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Kay Hagan was a kind & passionate public servant who fought from the heart for women, children, servicemembers, & working people in NC & across the country. My thoughts are with her husband Chip, their children & family, & the people of North Carolina.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: First responders in MA & across the country go above & beyond to save lives, keep us safe, & help our communities rebuild. I’m proud to have led the bipartisan Senate resolution to honor first responders’ service & sacrifices by designating today as #FirstRespondersDay.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @USArmy’s report suggests ways it can combat the #ClimateCrisis: reduce carbon emissions, invest in more research to be energy resilient, & budget for climate risks. The @DeptofDefense must do more to adapt to climate change, & I have a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A @USArmy report says the climate crisis will cause more frequent power outages, reduced access to water & food, mass migration, disease outbreaks & a greater chance of armed conflict. In other words, climate change is a public health & ntl security risk.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This Prescription Drug #TakeBackDay, dropoff centers are also accepting e-cigarettes & vaping products to help fight the epidemic of youth tobacco use. Find a location near you:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Millions of people get their wisdom teeth taken out or have minor surgery & don’t use all the painkillers prescribed to them. Help fight the opioid epidemic by safely disposing any unused opioids in your medicine cabinet at a drop off location today:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Taxpayers shouldn’t have to pay a heartless billionaire’s court fines for further punishing defrauded students. @BetsyDeVosED should be held personally accountable for violating court orders & breaking the law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Secretary @BetsyDeVosED deserves to be held in contempt for violating a court order to stop collecting Corinthian students’ debt. But let’s be clear: a $100k fine paid for by @usedgov punishes taxpayers – not DeVos herself.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I stand with our Dedham teachers who are courageously striking today for a fair contract with better pay. When teachers succeed, our children succeed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today our Senate office paid our respects to our friend and champion @RepCummings, who laid in state in the United States Capitol. His legacy of service befits this historic honor, & his powerful voice will never be forgotten in these halls.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 14 months after the @OIGatHHS recommended that @HHSgov recover at least $341,000 in taxpayer dollars that former Secretary Tom Price wasted on lavish travel, there’s no evidence HHS has done so. @PattyMurray, @RonWyden & I want answers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Amazon Web Services knew – or should have known – that its servers used by @CapitalOne were vulnerable to SSRF attacks. @RonWyden & I want the @FTC to investigate whether @awscloud’s role in the data theft of 100M Capital One customers broke federal law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Gwen Ifill was a talented journalist, a trailblazer for women of color, & the pride of @SimmonsUniv & Classical High School in Springfield, MA. I’m glad to see that she will be honored with a @USPS postage stamp next year.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For-profit colleges suck down taxpayer dollars as they load students up with debt for worthless degrees. I support the #StudentsNotProfits Act with @SenSherrodBrown & @RepJayapal to finally end this corruption & stop subsidizing for-profit colleges’ scams.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve spent years fighting side-by-side with our fearless @MassAGO Maura Healey to help MA students scammed by Corinthian Colleges. And we're going to stay in this fight until @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov follow the law & cancel every last Corinthian student’s loans.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m concerned that big banks are using short-term lending market volatility to pressure regulators to weaken the financial rules that protect our economy. @StevenMnuchin1 should explain why the govt needed to step in for the 1st time since the 2008 crisis.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill to #StopWallStreetLooting would hold private equity firms responsible for their companies – including in the health industry. And Congress should pass #MedicareForAll so nobody goes broke paying a medical bill that pads the pockets of insurance execs & Wall St bankers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Almost 2/3 of US hospitals outsource physician staffing, many to companies owned by private equity firms. @RepMarkPocan, @RepLloydDoggett & I want to know more about the role those firms play in the sharp rise in surprise out-of-network medical bills.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Nobody having a heart attack or stroke picks their ambulance or ER doc. But when a hospital outsources its physician staffing or ambulance services to a private-equity-owned company, patients can get stuck with outrageous medical bills. It's obscene.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Sec. @BetsyDeVosED has given a free pass to every swindler & crook trying to make a buck off America’s students & teachers. Now she’s choking the program designed to help keep teachers from getting crushed by decades of debt. I'll say it again, Sec. DeVos: do your job or resign.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ll give you one guess who’s responsible for obstructing student debt relief for teachers & other public servants. (Hint: it’s the Secretary of Education who doesn’t believe in public education.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: But most borrowers never got the help. Last month, @USGAO reported @usedgov is STILL rejecting 99% of Temporary Expanded PSLF applications. The Trump admin has only spent 3.8% of the emergency funding Congress set aside to help public service borrowers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve been fighting to fix the PSLF problem from the moment I heard about it – & I led the expansion of PSLF funding by $700 million over 2 years to forgive the student loan balances of people caught in this mess & enrolled in the wrong program.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Starting in 2007, our country made a promise to public servants: pay your student loans for 10 years & the balance would be wiped out. But as the 10-year point hit, people who thought they were enrolled in PSLF discovered they weren’t. It’s a nightmare.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Secretary @BetsyDeVosED & the Trump admin wrecked the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program for teachers & other public servants. @usedgov needs to explain why borrowers aren’t getting the help Congress made available & how they're planning to fix this.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is simple: if @Navient knows that @usedgov is too scared or captured to punish it for cheating students, then guess what? It’s going to keep cheating students while @BetsyDeVosED blocks & tackles for them. It’s time to finally end this cycle & #FireNavient.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @Navient @usedgov New evidence from a @CFPB lawsuit shows @Navient officials knew it was scamming students & didn't stop it. @SenBlumenthal & I told @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov they have no excuse: they can't throw more taxpayer money at Navient & renew their $200M contract.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Student loan giant @Navient (formerly Sallie Mae) has a history of cheating students & taxpayers more than a decade long. For years, I’ve pushed Republicans AND Democrats at @usedgov to hold Navient accountable, but the dept basically told me Navient is "Too Big to Fail."

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Good luck to everyone participating in the Head of the Charles this weekend! And special thanks to all of the volunteers & organizers who make this weekend so special for all of us in MA & our visitors from across the country & around the world. #HOCR55

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Transgender migrants & asylum seekers have faced appalling abuse & neglect. @SenatorBaldwin & I are calling on the Trump administration to reverse policies that are harming these vulnerable populations.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy birthday, Old Ironsides & the @USNavy! It’s an honor to have our country’s oldest commissioned ship in the Charlestown Navy Yard every day – but especially today.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Workers of color – especially women – are more likely to have unpredictable work schedules, face cancelled shifts, work consecutive closing & opening shifts, & be part-time workers. #SchedulesThatWork is about basic dignity & fairness for all workers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @rosadelauro The #SchedulesThatWork Act would set some ground rules for workers’ schedules:🗓️ Workers should get their schedule 2 weeks in advance🗓️ No retaliation against workers who ask for schedule changes🗓️ Workers have a right to rest between shifts

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: More than half of hourly workers get their work schedules with less than a week’s notice, making it tough to go to school, keep child care, & pay the bills. I’m reintroducing the #SchedulesThatWork Act with @RosaDeLauro for some economic security for working families.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Instead of strengthening anti-discrimination rules to protect homeowners & renters, @HUDgov is trying to make it nearly impossible for families of color to fight back against lenders & landlords. Read my op-ed on why all of us should be in this fight.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Whenever anyone would ask @RepCummings why we should keep fighting, even when the odds were against us, he’d always say: “We don’t have the right to be silent.” We honor his memory by staying in the fight and keeping his hope alive. Rest in power, Elijah.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@RepCummings was a fearless leader for social, economic, & racial justice, a giant for the people of Baltimore, & my dear friend & longtime partner. Sending my love to his beloved wife Maya, his children, his incredible staff, & everyone mourning the loss of our champion.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Government can be a powerful force for good – but only when it works for the people. It’s time to end lobbying as we know it & padlock the revolving door between our government & giant corporations. And I’ve got a bill for that. #endcorruptionnow

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For most of America’s history, when our companies did better, our workers did better – and America built a thriving middle class. The Accountable Capitalism Act will help realign our skewed market incentives so companies & workers can once again do well together.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 181 CEOs signed a @BizRoundtable non-binding pledge to account for workers & consumers in their decisions. I’m urging companies like @Amazon, @Walmart, @GM, @JPMorgan, @ATT, & @Comcast to keep that promise by supporting our Accountable Capitalism reforms.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It also requires billion-dollar companies to obtain a federal charter requiring directors to consider the interests of ALL their stakeholders, including employees, customers, & their communities. That charter can be revoked if a company has egregious & repeated illegal conduct.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Accountable Capitalism Act holds businesses accountable to their employees, not just shareholders:✅Requires workers to elect 40% of board ✅Restricts board & execs’ company stock sales✅Requires 75% of execs & shareholders' approval for political expenditures

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Year after year, corporate profits soar for executives & shareholders – but workers’ wages barely budge. I’m reintroducing my Accountable Capitalism Act with @repbenraylujan to empower workers & help fix this fundamental problem with our economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I worked with @RepPressley, @SenMarkey, & more than 100 colleagues to push @USCIS to reverse its decision to end some deferred action, including for sick children. Thanks, @RepCummings, for working to get answers about the Trump administration’s cruel, immoral decision.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy National #ComingOutDay! I’ll never stop fighting for a country where everyone feels safe to be who they are and love who they love.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Glad to be a strong federal partner to build the roads, bridges, & basic infrastructure we need to strengthen our economy & protect public safety. We’re in this fight — shoulder to shoulder — all the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A natural gas compressor station in Weymouth could be a health & safety nightmare for South Shore families. @SenMarkey, @RepStephenLynch & I urge @Enbridge to listen to the communities & abandon their plans to build a compressor station in Massachusetts.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The student debt crisis will only get worse – especially for students of color – unless Congress steps up to solve it. I’m honored to work side-by-side with @WhipClyburn to tackle this crisis head-on. #cancelmydebt

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Black Americans face the worst effects of the student debt crisis. Many still owe more than 100% of their loan balance 12 years college, even with a degree in hand. My #cancelmydebt bill with @WhipClyburn takes meaningful steps to close the racial wealth gap.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I was delighted to join @WhipClyburn at his alma mater @SCSTATE1896 for a town hall on our bill to cancel student debt for 42 million Americans. #cancelmydebt

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@usedgov needs to follow the law & cancel the student loans of scammed Corinthian Colleges students. And if @BetsyDeVosED wants to work for predatory for-profit colleges, she should resign & find herself a new job.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A federal judge was “astounded” by @BetsyDeVosED’s treatment of student borrowers. She said “At best it is gross negligence, at worst it’s an intentional flouting” of judicial orders to help students.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Secretary @BetsyDeVosED is such a failure at @usedgov that she may be held in contempt for refusing to follow the law & stop punishing scammed students. Think about that: she'd rather risk sanctions or even jail than do her job to help America's students.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Nobody fought harder to level the playing field for working people than my friend MarDee Xifaras. My heart goes out to her family, friends, & the countless people touched by her wisdom, kindness, & persistence. She will be deeply missed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In July, I joined @SenJeffMerkley & my colleagues in Congress on an amicus brief in support of equal rights for LGBTQ employees. Nobody should face discrimination at work — or anywhere else — for who they are or who they love.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m deeply grateful to Pleasant Hill Missionary Baptist Church & my friend Rev. Miniard Culpepper for their dedication & service to our communities in Boston. Congrats on your 80th anniversary, & I look forward to celebrating many more milestones to come!

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congrats to @DanaFarber, @BrighamWomens & @HarvardMed Dr. William Kaelin, Jr. for winning the @NobelPrize in Medicine. His groundbreaking work is a reminder of the importance of investing in medical research for the next big breakthrough to save lives.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I joined my colleagues in Congress on an amicus brief to the Supreme Court in support of DACA. Dreamers are woven into the fabric of our country, & they belong here. @realDonaldTrump was wrong – legally & morally – to target this deeply important program.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @CorpsNewEngland recommendation to replace the Sagamore & Bourne Bridges is good news for the Cape & Islands. Updating our infrastructure will help grow our economy & enhance public safety. I’m committed to seeing this important project move forward.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A year ago, the Saudi govt murdered journalist Jamal Khashoggi. There’s been no punishment for those who ordered this crime & the Trump admin ignores Congress's demands for accountability. We honor his memory by fighting for justice & human rights.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My friend @SenSanders has always been a strong partner in the Senate. Wishing him a speedy recovery so he can get back in the fight.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad investors are speaking out on climate change. @SenWhitehouse is right: their companies shouldn't hide behind groups like @USChamber that rig rules for polluters. My Climate Risk Disclosure Act will help hold corporations accountable for their role in the #climatecrisis.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My #StopWallStreetLooting bill would hold private equity firms responsible for their companies. And we should abolish private prisons & profit incentives that pervert the goal of our justice system.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: And the two largest private correctional medical care providers – both owned by private equity firms – have been sued about 1500 times over the past 5 years for “neglect, malpractice, and, in dozens of cases, wrongful injury or death.”

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Privatization & consolidation of prison food services means that private equity firms can make big bucks serving food with mold & maggots – & when incarcerated people decide to buy their own food, private equity profits off the commissaries. It’s all a racket.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity’s push into private prisons, detention centers, & prison services companies has helped create monopolies that squeeze families. Think about it: when there’s no competition for prison phone services, a 15-minute call home can cost $25.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our criminal justice system lets private equity firms rake in billions at the expense of incarcerated people, detainees, their families, & taxpayers. @RepMarkPocan, @RepAOC & I are investigating private equity firms profiteering off prison services.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@RepPressley, @RepAOC, & @RepBarbaraLee are right: everyone is entitled to high quality reproductive health care, & making that a reality starts with repealing the Hyde Amendment. #BeBoldEndHyde

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We can admit more refugees while keeping our country secure. I joined @SenJeffMerkley & @SenMarkey to demand the Trump admin not slam the door on refugees. America should remain a beacon of hope to vulnerable families around the world.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The United States has long been a humanitarian leader by welcoming refugees fleeing persecution & violence. But @realDonaldTrump slashed the number of refugees the US will accept to historic lows – & now he’s cutting further. It's heartless & wrong.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Historically black colleges & universities can’t wait weeks or months for the @SenateGOP to fund their schools – and they shouldn’t be used as bargaining chips. @SenAlexander needs to stop the games & fund our HBCUs & other minority-serving colleges NOW.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@SenMarkey, @RepLoriTrahan & I are fighting to pass the Leonel Rondon Pipeline Safety Act so gas companies prioritize our communities’ safety. And we’re demanding answers from @ColumbiaGasMA & @NiSourceInc on why they keep placing our residents & first responders at risk.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Just three days ago, the NTSB released a damning report that drew a direct link between weak engineering management at @NiSourceInc & @ColumbiaGasMA & last year’s devastating Merrimack Valley gas explosions.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A major gas leak was reported in Lawrence, & over 300 residents are being evacuated. We’re deeply grateful to Lawrence’s first responders & Mayor @danrivera01843 for their quick action to keep residents safe.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Cape Cod residents feel the #climatecrisis every day: erosion that threatens whole neighborhoods, a decimated fishing industry, & superstorms that could devastate the region. Read the @BostonGlobe’s powerful new reporting on climate change on the Cape.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 11 people have contracted #EEE in MA & 4 have died. @SenMarkey & I have asked @NIAIDNews for an update on federal research into this rare mosquito-borne virus with no specific treatment, & everyone in high-risk areas should take care to protect themselves & their loved ones.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The President asked a foreign govt to interfere in our elections. White House officials tried to cover it up & suppress this whistleblower. That’s a threat to our democracy. The House must do what the Constitution demands & vote on articles of

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The President told a foreign govt to do him a favor & work with his personal lawyer & the AG to investigate a political opponent. Read the "transcript." For the safety & integrity of our democracy, Congress must begin impeachment proceedings without delay.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The workers at Fidelity House provide essential care to our friends, family, and neighbors in Lawrence. They shouldn’t have to live in poverty. I support the members of @SEIU509 as they fight for a fair contract with higher wages, #equalpay, and better working conditions.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I said it on the floor of the US Senate in May & I’ll say it again: Congress must fulfill its Constitutional duty & begin impeachment proceedings against the President. Nobody is above the law – not even the President of the United States.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Title X has provided birth control, cancer screenings, HIV tests, & other basic health care services to nearly 4 million Americans. The 9th Circuit should stop the Trump admin’s unlawful crusade to gut Title X & control doctors & patients. #SaveTitleX

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: “The Paycheck Fairness Act that the House passed is going to be a big step towards addressing the gender pay gap.” -@RepDavids@SenateMajLdr, help close the pay gap – especially for women of color – & give that bill a vote. #NativeWomenEqualPayDay

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@RepDebHaaland is right: “The fact that Native women only make 58 cents on the dollar compared to white men in similar positions is absolutely unacceptable.” #NativeWomenEqualPayDay

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The fraud at @WellsFargo & other giant banks won’t stop until executives like John Stumpf know that they’ll be hauled out in handcuffs for cheating customers. I’ve got a bill for that to hold Wall Street executives personally accountable when their banks break the law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Three years after that John Stumpf hearing, @WellsFargo is STILL scamming customers. I’m demanding answers from Wells Fargo & our federal regulators about why these deep structural problems remain at the bank.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Six days after we called on the @USOCC & @CFPB to fire Tim Sloan, he stepped down as @WellsFargo’s CEO. I told Comptroller Otting to use his agency’s regulatory power to review Sloan’s successor, & he agreed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Tim Sloan said the bank changed, but we weren’t fooled. @WellsFargo kept right on scamming its customers on mortgages, car loans, money laundering – too much to fit in a tweet. So @SenSherrodBrown & I told the @CFPB & @USOCC to use their power to fire him.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Then I urged the new Fed Chair Jerome Powell to hold a public vote of the Federal Reserve Board before lifting @WellsFargo’s growth cap, & he agreed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I also urged Janet Yellen to use her powers as Fed Chair to hold @WellsFargo accountable. In her final act as Fed Chair, she froze @WellsFargo’s growth until it cleaned up its act & pushed out 4 of the board members responsible.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When @WellsFargo replaced John Stumpf with Tim Sloan, another senior Wells Fargo executive during the fake accounts scandal, I told him to his face that he should be

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @WellsFargo John Stumpf’s hearing on the @WellsFargo fake accounts scandal was a powerful moment for Wall Street accountability. But let’s just be clear: it was just the start of our work to stop this fundamentally broken bank from scamming its customers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Three years ago today, I told @WellsFargo CEO John Stumpf that he should resign. (He did.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Way to go, Boston! I’m proud of our students from across MA & around the country for leading this fight against the climate crisis. It’s past time we take bold action to tackle climate change head on for future generations. #ClimateStrike #MAClimateStrike #BostonClimateStrike

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration failed the people of Puerto Rico, & I’ve pushed @FEMA, @HUDgov, @DHSgov, @ENERGY, @OMBPress, @USDA, & @FOMBPR for accountability. We will not forget the victims of #HurricaneMaria. Learn more about my work for Puerto Rico here:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: And I have kept up oversight of @FEMA's Hurricane Maria contracting efforts, which have been part of the tragic mess that was the Administration's Puerto Rico disaster response. An investigation I requested revealed that FEMA did not follow federal procurements laws & regs.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Back in 2016, I opposed PROMESA, which imposed @FOMBPR on Puerto Rico. And since Hurricane Maria, I have repeatedly pushed that Board on its slashes to government services, its friendliness to Wall Street creditors, & its conflicts of interest.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In June, I cosponsored a bill to end the discriminatory double standards in the way Medicare & Medicaid are administered in the US territories.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: With @SenatorMenendez & Rep. @NydiaVelazquez, I questioned @FEMA about delays rebuilding the hospital on the island of Vieques, that served 9,000 US citizens & was destroyed in Hurricane Maria. The next week, the agency confirmed it would be rebuilt.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I also reintroduced my bill with @RepEspaillat to make it easier for survivors of natural disasters like Hurricane Maria to receive housing assistance from @FEMA & @HUDgov.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In May, I reintroduced my bill, the US Territorial Relief Act, to give disaster-stricken US territories like Puerto Rico a path to comprehensive debt relief so they can recover & rebuild with dignity.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In February, I introduced my bill with Rep. @NydiaVelazquez to prevent @realDonaldTrump from using disaster relief funds to fund his border wall.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: After I investigated reports that the Administration was using the government shutdown as an excuse to stall aid to Puerto Rico, @HUDgov confirmed that the shutdown delayed billions of dollars of disaster relief funds for the island.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In January, I reintroduced a bill with Sen. @GillibrandNY & Rep. @NydiaVelazquez to establish a 9/11-style independent commission to investigate the federal response to the hurricanes in Puerto Rico.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Two years ago today, Hurricane Maria devastated Puerto Rico & the US Virgin Islands. I’m still persisting in this fight to ensure our government keeps its responsibility to help these US citizens recover & thrive.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad the Senate passed my bill with @SenTomCotton to ensure the POW/MIA flag is always displayed with the US flag in the Capitol, Vietnam Vets Memorial & other federal properties. I’m working to get it passed in the House & signed by the President.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Thousands of American service members have been imprisoned & are still missing in action from past conflicts. On #POWMIARecognitionDay we honor those who served and those who have not returned home. They must never be forgotten, & I have a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: On this second anniversary of #HurricaneMaria, I’m still fighting for our federal government to treat the US citizens on Puerto Rico with the respect they deserve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Incredible news: Our Senate office just received word that @USCIS will resume consideration of some deferred action requests, including medical deferred action for sick children. This is a powerful victory for people across the country who fought back & made their voices heard.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Dr. Emily Clyburn was a tireless voice for justice & opportunity. My prayers are with @WhipClyburn, their family, & the people of South Carolina for their loss.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We should be investing in our Historically Black Colleges & Universities, not treating them & their funding like political footballs. Senate Republicans need to stop the games & pass critical funding for HBCUs this week.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve got a bill that would put private equity firms on the hook for the decisions made by the companies they control, including for-profit colleges. It’s long past time to hold these firms accountable for steering colleges into a ditch & scamming students.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In industry after industry, private equity firms have stripped companies of assets, loaded them with debt, extracted $$$ & skipped away when the bets went bad. Students & taxpayers deserve to understand the shadowy role these firms play in an industry already fraught with abuse.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 35% of for-profit students are enrolled in private equity-owned schools, & those schools have higher tuition, more student borrowing, & lower grad rates. Their business isn't educating students – it's sucking down federal student aid, which makes up nearly all of their revenue.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Predatory for-profit colleges often load students with debt for useless degrees. They’re the worst, & for-profit schools owned by private equity firms are the worst of the worst. So @RepMarkPocan & I are investigating private equity takeovers of colleges.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Senators’ thoughts & prayers aren’t stopping the mass shootings, but our votes can. Time’s up, @SenateGOP. Stand up to the gun industry & give these bills a vote.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The majority of Americans support common sense gun safety laws & are urging the Senate to take action. But @SenateMajLdr McConnell & the @SenateGOP are too scared of the @NRA to act. Let's call this out for what it is: corruption, plain & simple.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Kids are being slaughtered in their classrooms. Mothers, fathers, brothers, & sisters are being gunned down in places of worship, homes, clubs, supermarkets, & streets. And day after day, tragedy after tragedy, we're still here begging the @SenateGOP to do something.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The game is up: Amazon pretends to be a neutral marketplace platform, but it bulldozes competition by juicing the search results for its own products. Reports say even Amazon’s own lawyers identify this as an antitrust problem. The @FTC must take action.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Hurricane Dorian devastated the Bahamas, but the Trump administration made the heartless decision not to grant Temporary Protected Status to impacted Bahamians. I joined @SenatorMenendez in introducing a bill to undo the administration’s immoral decision.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Rev. Michael Haynes was a pillar of faith & justice for the people of Boston. Bruce & I send our prayers to his loved ones, Twelfth Baptist Church, & the countless people touched by his kindness & leadership in our community.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m proud of our Boston & Springfield students for standing up to the gun lobby to end gun violence. Our students are leading the fight to keep our schools & streets safe, & our government must follow their lead.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Amazon has looked the other way while its contract delivery workers are forced into unsafe vehicles & given dangerous workloads. @SenBlumenthal, @SenSherrodBrown, & I want Amazon to explain this repeated disregard for workers’ rights & safety.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congress should pass @SenMarkey & @RepLoriTrahan’s  Leonel Rondon Pipeline Safety Act to prevent disasters like the @ColumbiaGasMA explosions. And we should pass my Accountable Capitalism Act to force companies like @NiSource to pay attention to workers’ & communities' interests.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We’ve seen this pattern repeatedly: when corporate execs cut corners & hurt consumers, they leave taxpayers & communities to clean up the mess. Merrimack Valley small businesses are still digging out of a financial hole from repairs & lost customers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @NTSB blamed the Merrimack Valley gas explosions squarely on @ColumbiaGasMA  & @NiSourceInc. But when we asked their executives about "personal responsibility" at @SenMarkey’s hearing, we heard nobody got fired. A young man died, so they probably wouldn’t get an annual bonus.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: One year ago, the @ColumbiaGasMA explosions destroyed Merrimack Valley homes & businesses & tragically killed a young man. Mayor @danrivera01843 & I wrote to the @EagleTrib about what must be done to prevent a disaster like this from ever happening again.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Students who get scammed by a predatory for-profit college should not by punished by losing their Pell Grant eligibility. I’m glad to reintroduce the Pell Grant Restoration Act with our House cosponsors @RepJahanaHayes, @RepMGS, & @RepLucyMcBath.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Many 9/11 first responders still experience illnesses & other injuries from Ground Zero. This anniversary, I'm grateful for @gillibrandny's longtime leadership to extend compensation for 9/11 first responders.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 18 years ago, nearly 3,000 Americans – including 206 people from MA – died when terrorists attacked our shores. This 9/11 anniversary, let's come together to remember the lives lost, and take care our first responders and their loved ones. #NeverForget

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @USArmy IG’s review of the military housing program revealed many of the same systemic problems as my investigation. We need to act quickly to pass my bill with @RepDebHaaland to improve housing conditions for military families.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When I learned that many military families face poor on-base housing conditions because of greedy, big housing companies & the Pentagon's failed oversight of this program, I investigated, & then I introduced a bill to make it right.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: John Bolton has never met a war he didn’t like. He never should have been National Security Adviser in the first place.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: At least 3 migrant children in US custody died, in part, from the flu – but @CBP won’t administer flu vaccines to detained families. @SecAzar & @DHSMcAleenan should reverse this immoral & irresponsible decision.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In the middle of a housing affordability crisis, the Trump Administration wants to make it harder for creditworthy working families – especially families of color – to buy a home & build wealth. That’s shameful.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My Anti-Corruption & Public Integrity Act includes & builds on the Presidential Conflicts of Interest Act to fundamentally change the way Washington does business. Congress should pass it & help restore the American people’s faith in democracy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Weeks before @realDonaldTrump was sworn into office, I introduced the Presidential Conflicts of Interest Act to require the President & VP to fully divest from any potential financial conflicts of interest – including Trump hotels in Ireland, DC, & everywhere else.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@VP Pence’s taxpayer-funded stay at @realDonaldTrump’s Ireland golf resort is just another example of this admin’s open corruption & how it enriches the President. I want the @StateDept to explain who planned this trip & its cost to the American people.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration has created a humanitarian catastrophe at the border with cruel policies that deliberately inflict pain on children & families. We must shut down for-profit detention facilities, stop family separation, & create a fair, humane immigration system.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @OIGatHHS report is appalling: long detention resulted in “defiance, hopelessness, & frustration among children, along with more instances of self-harm & suicidal ideation.” “Acute grief that caused them to cry inconsolably.” “Every single separated kid has been terrified.”

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This administration is not adequately caring for the health of detained migrant children who may have been abused, kidnapped, tortured, or witnesses to murder – & its family separation policies are only hurting these children more. https://t.co/bWB7rEavrE

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Most child detention facilities let employees start working without a background check, & some received background check waivers entirely. Simply put, these facilities are understaffed. And staff are often unqualified to care for traumatized children. https://t.co/CLg5yT118h

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In June, @SenBrianSchatz & I led a request that @OIGatHHS investigate the troubling allegations about the health & safety of migrant children at federal contractor facilities. Two of their reports confirm some of these concerns.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Five people in MA this year have contracted Eastern equine encephalitis, a rare but potentially fatal virus with no treatment. @SenMarkey & I have asked @NIAIDNews for info about federal research into EEE so we can prevent & treat this dangerous illness.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Toys “R” Us. Sears. Radio Shack. Payless. Shopko. Private equity firms are killing jobs, hurting workers, & draining our economy. I’ve got a bill to #StopWallStreetLooting – & I’m in this fight with @forrespect all the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve spent years in the Senate fighting back against predatory for-profit colleges & the companies, banks, organizations & officials that enable them to scam students. I won’t stop fighting @usedgov until students receive the debt relief they deserve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When shady for-profit colleges cheat students, those students are entitled to get their student loans cancelled. That’s the law. I’m disgusted that @BetsyDeVosED is making it harder for defrauded students to have their loans discharged.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m concerned about reports of two separate incidents of racist & anti-Semitic graffiti at Fort Revere Park & Watuppa Reservation in MA over the past week. Cowardly acts of hate don’t belong in the Commonwealth or anywhere else in this country.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad that the Trump administration is having second thoughts about deporting sick children after we fought back, but this partial reversal just isn't good enough. @USCIS must fully reverse its cruel policy to reject medical deferred action requests.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@WhipClyburn & I are sorry that we won’t see everyone at @SCState1896 tomorrow, but your safety is our biggest concern. South Carolina, please take care & follow @SCEMD for the latest information about Hurricane #Dorian.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy #LaborDay! Today we say loud & clear: unions built America’s middle class, & unions will rebuild America’s middle class.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Coming out of the Great Depression, labor unions helped build America’s strong middle class. As our families got richer, our country got richer – & labor unions were a big part of it. Today, unions are under attack, & we need to fight back so workers can make their voices heard.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Time’s up, @SenateMajLdr. Let’s vote on gun safety legislation NOW. Every day you wait, more tragedies happen. Do something, Senator McConnell. America is done waiting for you.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My Payment Modernization Act would create a national payments system so the money deposited in your bank account appears in real-time. No more living in fear over Labor Day that your rent will be processed before your paycheck clears. Congress should act to make this happen.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is the sort of weekend that terrifies people living paycheck-to-paycheck:🏠 Rent is due Sunday 9/1💰 Friday’s deposited paycheck may not clear for days because of the holiday weekendOverdraft fees & payday lenders shouldn't be the solution. I’ve got a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m in this fight for America’s workers every step of the way. #LaborDay

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We must take emissions seriously & hold polluters accountable to avoid environmental catastrophe. In July, @FSCDems passed my Climate Risk Disclosure Act to make companies disclose climate-related risks. @SenateMajLdr McConnell, give our bill a vote.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration’s proposal to roll back methane emissions rules is a giant wet kiss to Big Oil & other dirty polluters. The #climatecrisis threatens our health, economy, & national security – & this reckless plan will only make it worse.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: People come to MA from around the world to receive life-saving care. Now the Trump admin could be handing sick kids a death sentence along with deportation papers. @USCIS must reverse its heartless policy of rejecting all medical deferred action requests.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The federal government failed our fellow US citizens in Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria. We cannot fail them again. #Dorian

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: If @USCIS truly wants to address the urgent needs of migrants at the border, it can start by reversing its unconscionable expansion of detention camps & other bad policies. Suspending asylum interviews is another cruel way to hurt families fleeing violence, persecution & poverty.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: There are 40,000 pending asylum cases in New England that will essentially be frozen by @USCIS’ decision to suspend asylum interviews in Boston. This is an unfair & unjustified shift of resources that will force applicants who have been waiting for years to wait even longer.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@USCIS’ decision to gut their New England asylum office won’t help the humanitarian crisis at the border – it will inflame it. @SenMarkey, @RepPressley & I want @USCISCuccinelli to explain why his agency is further straining our asylum backlog.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This pick for @CFPB Student Loan Ombudsman is a slap in the face to student loan borrowers in MA & across the country. They deserve better. That’s why @CFPBDirector & @stevenmnuchin1 should pick someone else with real experience fighting for students, not another industry hack.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @CFPB Student Loan Ombudsman is supposed to protect students, but the Admin's pick was a top lawyer for @MyFedLoan – a student loan giant being sued by @MassAGO for undermining Public Service Loan Forgiveness & overcharging student borrowers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Need proof that the Trump administration works for student loan companies & not student loan borrowers? They just appointed a former executive from a giant student loan company to be the nation’s top student loan watchdog at the @CFPB. It’s outrageous.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When retail stores or mining companies go bankrupt, their owners should have to prioritize workers' pay so they receive the severance, pensions, & other payments they earned. That’s exactly what my bill to #StopWallStreetLooting would do.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realdonaldtrump's latest attack on immigrant families is to keep kids and their parents in cages indefinitely. Families fleeing violence and persecution don't belong in filthy prisons. I'll fight this policy and all attacks on immigrant communities.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The United States already has nearly 4,000 nuclear weapons in our active arsenal, & our conventional military might is overwhelming. Doubling down on more nuclear weapons while scrapping nuclear treaties undercuts our nonproliferation efforts around the world.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We urge keeping provisions that:☢️Ban the deployment of dangerous, costly & unnecessary W76-2 low-yield nuclear warheads☢️Call on the Trump admin to extend the New START treaty☢️Deny funding for certain nuclear missiles to prevent an arms race following the INF Treaty collapse

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A nuclear arms race doesn’t make the U.S. – or the world – any safer. That’s why I’m leading 17 other senators in urging @JimInhofe & @SenJackReed to include 3 key nuclear weapons provisions in next year’s defense budget.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m done hearing about all the new ways @WellsFargo is cheating its customers. And I’m done with President Trump’s appointed regulators who look the other way. Wells Fargo is fundamentally broken. I’m going to keep fighting with everything I’ve got to hold them accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Here’s the deal: In the past 3 years @WellsFargo has sworn up & down that it’s changed – & it’s been caught scamming customers & lying to regulators in more than a dozen ways. Fake accounts. Unneeded auto insurance fees. Wrongful foreclosures & repossessed cars. Enough is enough.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Three years after the fake accounts scandal, @WellsFargo got caught raking in cash from accounts that its customers didn’t know they had – AGAIN. Today I’m opening an investigation & demanding answers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In 2013, I asked why a kid caught with an ounce of drugs goes to jail, but a bank exec that launders a billion dollars in drug money pays a fine & sleeps in their own bed at night. It's clear: we have one justice system for the rich & powerful, & another for everybody else.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We need stronger rules on Wall Street, & tough regulators to enforce them. That’s why my anti-corruption bill locks the revolving door between Wall Street & Washington, & my Ending Too Big to Jail Act puts big bank executives in handcuffs when their banks break the law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The American people have a right to know how & why @realDonaldTrump’s political appointees at @TheJusticeDept are influencing the settlement process to help @Barclays & @RBS avoid accountability for their role in the 2008 financial crisis. I want answers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: After the 2008 financial crisis, millions lost their homes, jobs, & life savings – & no CEOs went to jail. A decade later, it’s unconscionable that @TheJusticeDept still won't hold corporate criminals accountable for their role in breaking our economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration is deliberately obstructing low-income people’s access to basic health care services & interfering in medical decisions made by patients & their doctors. If the administration won’t #ProtectX, then the courts must.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Tweet: Today, @HUDgov is proposing a rule that would give landlords, mortgage lenders, & others the power to discriminate against homebuyers & renters with no consequences.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: What did the tortoise do when the Student Loan Debt Relief Act became law? Shell-ebrated being turtle-y debt free!

Tweet: .@RepDebHaaland & I invite feedback about this proposal & look forward to working closely with tribal nations & citizens, experts, & other stakeholders to advance legislation in Congress that honors the United States’ promises to Native peoples.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The US government has a responsibility to honor its obligations to Native peoples. That’s why I’m working with @RepDebHaaland to draft a bill to empower tribal nations & address the chronic underfunding in Indian Country. Learn more about our proposal:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @realDonaldTrump While we fight to #ProtectTheDream & fix our country’s broken immigration system, it’s powerfully important for all DACA recipients to keep their status up-to-date. Renew your DACA status here:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy 84th birthday, Social Security! For 22 million seniors, veterans, children, and people with disabilities, Social Security is all that stands between them & poverty. I’m proud to lead the fight to protect & expand Social Security in the Senate.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Vineyard Wind project will create thousands of jobs & generate cleaner, cheaper wind energy for MA families. The Trump admin should work towards a solution that will protect the environment, address local fishermen's concerns & allow the project to move forward without delay.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration’s last-minute decision to delay approval of the Vineyard Wind clean energy project is extremely disappointing. Once again they’ve chosen to put corporate polluters’ profits over Americans’ well-being.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @FTC is supposed to protect Americans from deceptive advertising. Instead they misinformed consumers about the terms of the @Equifax settlement. The FTC should explain how this happened.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 145 million Americans qualified for the $125 @Equifax settlement refund that the @FTC advertised. But let’s do the math: A $31,000,000 compensation fund ÷ $125 = 248,000 checks.   That's right: the FTC planned for less than 1% of people to get the money they’re owed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We all saw the tweets: sign up to get $125 back from @Equifax for exposing your personal data. Here’s the problem: the @FTC didn’t plan on you doing it. I want the FTC Inspector General to investigate how the agency misled the American people.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We need bold action to build more affordable housing and help families live strong, healthy lives – and I’ve got a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Every kid deserves a chance to succeed – no matter where they’re from. I’m fighting back against @DHSgov’s harmful new policy & fighting to protect immigrant families in MA and across the country.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: President Trump’s agenda is clear: blame our country’s problems on people who don’t look like you, or speak like you, or pray like you – and when we turn on each other, we can’t unite to fight back against a rigged system.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration just put out a new rule to punish immigrant families – discouraging them from getting food, health care, or housing assistance for themselves or their children, & making it harder for them to become U.S. citizens.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We need to stop self-dealing public officials & padlock the revolving door between big business & government. That’s why I’ve introduced the most ambitious anti-corruption legislation since Watergate. These reforms will help us build a country & a government worth fighting for.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our national crisis of faith in government boils down to this simple fact: people don’t trust their government to do the right thing because they think it works for the rich & powerful, not for the American people. And here’s the kicker: They’re right.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@Novartis manipulated testing data to rush its drug to market & exploit govt perks. Now its $2.1M spinal muscular atrophy drug is the most expensive med in US history. The @US_FDA works for the people, not big pharma, & must hold Novartis accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Great to see schools like @UMassAmherst taking real steps to address student hunger on campus! Congress can help more colleges tackle this problem by expanding access to SNAP for more low-income students. @RepAlLawsonJr & I have a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Surprise surprise: the @USChamber's Big Oil & Coal lawyers are fighting the @LungAssociation’s lawsuit against the Trump admin’s attack on clean air & our climate. The Chamber should be fighting for green jobs, not bullying public health advocates.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It took @CapitalOne nearly 4 months to detect the data breach & they’re still working to notify customers. People deserve timely info about what exactly Capital One is doing to protect people’s personal data at risk because of the company's security failures.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: According to news reports, the @CapitalOne hacker had worked for Amazon Web Services, which hosts the company’s database. I’m troubled that other employees may have the same knowledge the hacker had, & the security weaknesses allegedly exploited are “commonly known.”

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last week, @CapitalOne reported a massive data breach that compromised personal data of more than 100 million customers & credit card applicants. I want to know how this happened, how they're fixing this vulnerability, & who is being held accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad the @DHSOIG is investigating @CBP’s alarming surveillance reportedly targeting journalists, attorneys, & organizers. The American people deserve answers about how & why @DHSgov obtained this info & how they’ve used

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our military leaders understand that America’s foreign policy cannot be run exclusively by the Pentagon. We should be investing in diplomacy & development to address political, social & economic problems before they morph into costly wars.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: America’s defense budget is more bloated than ever, but our national security cannot rely on a strong military alone. So why in the world is @realDonaldTrump trying to block billions in the @StateDept’s diplomacy, development & global health funds?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad the @FederalReserve has finally taken action so working families & small business owners don’t have to wait up to 5 days to get paid & pay their bills. I look forward to working with the Fed to ensure this system is implemented swiftly & smoothly.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Just like the hateful terrorism of Al Qaeda & ISIS, domestic right-wing terrorism & white nationalism is completely incompatible with our American values. It is a threat to American safety & security, & we must not tolerate it in the United States.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The House passed a bill more than 5 months ago to require basic background checks on gun sales — the very least we can do to keep our loved ones safe. How many more people need to die before @SenateMajLdr McConnell puts aside @NRA interests and gives that bill a vote?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Tonight I’m heartsick for El Paso & I’m once again disgusted by the GOP leadership in Washington. Americans shouldn’t have to live in fear that if they go to Walmart, or a festival, or school, or just walk down the street that they won’t make it home alive. This has to stop.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Withdrawing from the INF Treaty won't make us or our European allies safer. We should be holding Russia accountable for its violations – not torching the treaty that has prevented a dangerous arms race for over 30 years.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@RepPressley & @RepLoriTrahan are both smart, passionate, & fearless leaders for the people of Massachusetts & people all across our country. I’m lucky to have them fighting by my side in Washington.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Contrary to popular belief, I too am not @SenatorBaldwin or @SenTinaSmith – but I couldn’t have said this better myself. Climate change is an existential threat to the Great Lakes, New England, and every corner of this country. It’s time for Washington to fight back.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The first step to fix the student debt crisis is to deal with the outstanding debt that never should have been required in the first place. That’s why I’ve got a bill with @WhipClyburn to cancel student debt for 42 million Americans. #CancelMyDebt

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: America’s students did everything we told them to do: they worked hard, got good grades, & went to college – & now they’re drowning in debt. Washington is to blame for putting the interests of billionaires & giant corporations over middle class families.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My friend @AdyBarkan came to the Senate a few months ago to testify about why we need #MedicareForAll. Health care is a basic human right, and it’s people like Ady – & the people I hear from across MA & around the country – who keep me in this fight.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I asked @DHSOIG to find out how many US citizens have been detained by @CBP & @ICEgov, why, for how long, & under what conditions. They need to examine what procedures are in place to stop these wrongful arrests & mistaken detentions, & whether agents are using racial profiling.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 9-year-old Julia Isabel Amparo Medina was detained on her way to school at a border stop when @CBP officers claimed she didn’t look like her photo on her passport card. This little girl – an American citizen – was wrongly held for 32 hours.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Francisco Erwin Galicia is a US citizen who was detained at the border after @CBP claimed his TX birth certificate, ID, & Social Security card were fake. He was held for more than 3 weeks & lost 26 pounds from lack of food.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is a nightmare: US citizens were stopped by @CBP, presented their proof of citizenship, & were held without recourse for hours, days, or weeks. I want @DHSOIG to investigate this potentially severe & unacceptable abuse of power.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Investing in clean energy & green manufacturing can grow our economy & reverse factory job losses from the past 2 decades, while making sure we #ActOnClimate. It’s beyond time for the @USChamber & @ShopFloorNAM to get on board. #ChamberofCarbon

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: American businesses should be leading the fight against the #ClimateCrisis & dominating the clean energy economy. But the @USChamber, @ShopFloorNAM, & their armies of lobbyists have spent decades dragging their feet & rigging the rules for giant oil companies. #ChamberofCarbon

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Threatening to use nuclear weapons first makes America less safe because it increases the chances of a miscalculation or an accident. There are no winners in a nuclear war, and the US should never start one. I have a bill for that. https://t.co/8NwS5g65YT

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: There’s no better place to spend a beautiful summer weekend than Cape Cod. Please come show your support for our local MA businesses!

Tweet: I’m proud of the way our first responders, local officials, & communities have come together on the Cape this week. Massachusetts knows that when we help our neighbors, we make each other stronger.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Name: Elizabeth Warren
