Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Ryan Zinke resigned after using the @Interior Dept like his own personal piggy bank. So he found a better way to cash in: working for the oil & mining companies he used to regulate. I guess when you’re caught in a hole of corruption, just keep

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @AmerMedicalAssn says gun violence is a public health crisis – but the @NRA has spent decades blocking funding for scientific research to prevent it. This shouldn’t be a partisan issue – the Senate should #FundGVPResearch because #ResearchSavesLives.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Woo-hoo! The House unanimously passed the PRIDE Act, which included my bill with @RepJudyChu & @RepAndyLevin to let legally married same-sex couples get the tax refunds they were denied. @senatemajldr should do what's right & give our bill a vote.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: These cowardly acts of racism, anti-Semitism, bigotry & hate have no place in Massachusetts or anywhere else in this country.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realDonaldTrump vetoed 3 resolutions that would prevent him from selling arms to Saudi Arabia & the UAE without Congressional approval. We must put the interests of the Yemeni people above US defense contractors & end our role in this war.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our payments bill will make sure that families have faster access to the money they earned & save people billions of dollars each year from paying overdraft fees or turning to shady payday lenders to make ends meet.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My Payment Modernization Act with @ChrisVanHollen, @RepPressley & @RepChuyGarcia would require the @FederalReserve to create a national payments system so checks deposited in your bank account appear in real time. No more anxiously waiting over a weekend or holiday.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: People living paycheck-to-paycheck can’t wait days for a check to clear to pay for rent or groceries. And they shouldn't have to – central banks in other countries already have real-time payments systems. So we’ve got a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity firms have gutted some of America’s biggest retail chains & walked away scot-free while workers lost everything. That’s why my bill to #StopWallStreetLooting would protect workers & fundamentally change the private equity industry.

Tweet: We already knew that the @FTC’s $5 billion settlement with @facebook is a drop-in-the-bucket penalty. The fine print proves that it’s a joke.

Tweet: Watch the second part of Robert Mueller’s House hearing here. Mueller’s testimony has already made it clear that the President obstructed justice, that Mueller’s investigation did not exonerate him, and that Congress must act.

Tweet: Watch Robert Mueller’s testimony here. It should be clear to anyone who read the Mueller Report that Congress has a constitutional duty to begin impeachment proceedings. I hope Congress is paying attention today.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: America’s trade deals have delivered one gut punch after another to America’s workers & the unions that fight for them. The last thing workers need is a NAFTA 2.0 deal rigged by Big Pharma to keep prescription drug prices high.

Tweet: My office is monitoring the severe weather on the Cape & the power outage impacting up to 30,000 homes. Please follow @MassEMA for directions & information to keep your family safe.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity investor Leo Hindery is right – too often his industry incentivizes “reckless & often immoral behavior” & it desperately needs reform. I’m glad to have his support to #StopWallStreetLooting so American workers & companies can succeed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Thank you, @RepDebHaaland, for defending our shared values that there is space for everyone in this country, and that nobody in our community should be left behind. I’m grateful for your important perspective and your leadership against hatred and racism.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: But I learned something in that fight for Dodd-Frank nine years ago today: You don’t get what you don’t fight for. I’m honored to have the opportunity to use every tool in the toolbox to hold Wall Street accountable & make our government work for the people.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I'll just be blunt: The @realDonaldTrump administration is fighting to kill the rules on Wall Street & gut the @CFPB at any chance they can. The cops on the beat are only looking out for the crooks who are cheating American consumers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: And my new #StopWallStreetLooting Act that I introduced this past week would fundamentally change the private equity industry to prevent Wall Street from destroying companies like Toys “R” Us, Sears, & Shopko.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill to #EndCorruptionNow – the most ambitious anti-corruption legislation since Watergate –  would help lock the revolving door between Wall Street and Washington to make our government work for the people.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: After @Equifax compromised the personal data of at least 145 million Americans, I fought to hold them accountable & introduced the Data Breach Prevention and Compensation Act to impose massive, mandatory fines when credit reporting agencies expose people’s personal data.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve introduced the Ending Too Big to Jail Act to hold Wall Street executives criminally accountable for their banks’ fraud & illegal activity. When Wall Street CEOs break the law, they should go to jail like anyone else.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m the author & lead sponsor of the 21st Century Glass-Steagall Act, legislation to separate boring commercial banking (checking & savings accounts) from risky investment banking, to make our financial system safer & prevent another Wall St bailout.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: And when @WellsFargo then named Tim Sloan CEO – a 30-year Wells Fargo executive who got rich off the fake accounts scandal & helped cover it up – I called for his removal too. (He was.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In 2016, I called on @WellsFargo CEO John Stumpf to resign after his bank opened millions of fake accounts in their customers’ names. (He did.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In 2013, I asked why a kid caught with an ounce of drugs will go to jail, but a bank exec that launders a billion dollars in drug money pays a fine and gets to go home to sleep in their own bed at night.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The big banks have fought financial reform – especially the @CFPB – every step of the way. So from my first Senate banking committee hearing in 2013, I’ve pushed our banking regulators to hold Wall St accountable for cheating people & breaking our economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Exactly 8 years ago, we opened the doors at the @CFPB. Eight years since we built an agency to get the tricks & traps out of the fine print of credit cards, mortgages, & other financial products. And in 8 years, it’s returned billions of dollars to people who have been cheated.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Nine years ago today, I ran out of the Senate – where I was a witness testifying about the TARP Wall St bailout – and raced to the @WhiteHouse. With seconds to spare, I got to see President @BarackObama sign Dodd-Frank, the Wall Street reform bill that gave us the @CFPB.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Workers from Sears, Toys “R” Us, & Shopko have had to fight tooth & nail for their pay, severance, & pensions. I was proud to be joined by those workers this week to introduce the #StopWallStreetLooting Act to hold private equity firms accountable for the companies they buy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Retail stores aren’t the only ones gutted by private equity. Local papers have been hit hard by investment funds that load them with debt, cut staff, & squeeze them until they go under. My #StopWallStreetLooting Act gives newspapers a fighting chance.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Earlier this week @realDonaldTrump’s administration issued a sweeping asylum ban. Now they’re trying to end refugee admissions. The President wants to slam the door on people fleeing persecution & put them back in danger. This is cruel, unnecessary, & un-American.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m very glad that @TheNationsFirst & our state leaders will continue to allow transgender Americans to serve in the MA National Guard. Our Commonwealth is safer when we allow everyone who can handle the job to serve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We must end the worst abuses of private equity that kill jobs, hurt workers, & drain our economy. The #StopWallStreetLooting Act is a bold new plan to fundamentally change the industry.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our new #StopWallStreetLooting Act would:✔️Put private investment funds on the hook for their companies' debt & liabilities✔️End corporate looting through excessive fees & dividends✔️Protects workers' jobs & severance✔️Safeguard the markets from risky corporate debt

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When companies like Sears fail, workers lose everything. But the private equity & investment funds? They collect huge fees & move on to the next big deal. It’s time to #StopWallStreetLooting to protect workers & hold private equity accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s not just stores at the mall that suffer from Wall Street looting. Private equity has ruined newspapers, manufactured housing, grocery stores, & even nursing homes in MA & across the country.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @SenatorBaldwin @SenSherrodBrown @repmarkpocan @RepJayapal When I was a kid, my mom’s job at Sears saved our family. But that Sears doesn’t exist today. Neither does Payless, Shopko, or Gymboree. That’s because private equity & investment funds bought them, stripped them for parts, & drove them into the ground. #StopWallStreetLooting

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private equity firms want you to believe you’re not smart enough to understand their business model. But it's pretty simple: take over companies & loot 'em. And I’ve got a bill with @SenatorBaldwin, @SenSherrodBrown, @RepMarkPocan & @RepJayapal to fix it. #StopWallStreetLooting

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Food insecurity is a real, structural problem that’s another barrier between low-income students & the chance to finally get a college education. The College Student Hunger Act will tackle this problem head-on. We can fix this. #RealCollege

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My College Student Hunger Act with @RepAlLawsonJr would:❌ Expand access to SNAP for more low-income students❌ Increase outreach to eligible students❌ Require @usedgov & @USDA to connect eligible students with SNAP

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: As more & more students struggle to pay for college, 30% may be going hungry. Students shouldn’t have to choose between paying tuition & eating. That’s why I’ve got a bill to ensure college students can succeed without going hungry. #RealCollege

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I have a bill for that. Congress should pass my #CAREAct with @RepCummings to provide cities, counties, states, territories, & tribal governments with the comprehensive funding they need to fight the opioid epidemic. We can do this right now.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Great news: @FSCDems passed my Climate Risk Disclosure Act with @RepCasten yesterday. We’re one step closer to requiring public companies to disclose their climate-related risks and speeding up the transition to a green economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Let’s be very clear: @realDonaldTrump’s tweets were racist. Persist, @SpeakerPelosi. Persist. #shepersisted

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The American people deserve to know that the @DeptofDefense Secretary will make decisions in our country’s best security interests, not in @Raytheon’s or his own financial interests. If @EsperDoD won’t commit to address his conflicts, he should not be confirmed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last week, I met with @EsperDoD & asked him to extend his @Raytheon recusal through the duration of his tenure at the @DeptofDefense. He refused. I’m troubled by Esper’s unwillingness to fully address his conflicts of interest & urge him to reconsider.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Mark @EsperDoD ran @Raytheon’s lobbying shop for 7 years. In fact, he’s still waiting on a million-dollar payout from them after 2022. I have serious ethical concerns about his @DeptofDefense Secretary nomination.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill to #EndCorruptionNow would shut the revolving door between the government & big business, including @CommerceGov & the steel industry. It’s long past time to root out corruption in every corner of our government & make it work for the people.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@CommerceGov's process for exempting companies from Trump’s steel & aluminum tariffs appears to be arbitrary, opaque, & subject to favoritism. It’s run by 2 former industry insiders. I want more info on this potentially serious conflict of interest.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Fed Chair Jerome Powell is right: the opioid epidemic is a “national crisis.” That’s why @RepCummings & I have the most ambitious legislation in Congress to put an end to it. #CAREact

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Facebook made $5 billion in profits in just the first three months of last year. The company is too big to oversee, and this drop-in-the-bucket penalty confirms that. The FTC should break Facebook up, plain and simple. Enough is enough.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The FTC just voted to let Facebook off easy with a $5 billion settlement for compromising the data of tens of millions of Americans and allowing our elections to be improperly

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Private, for-profit prisons are rife with safety, health, and human rights concerns. We should abolish them altogether.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I want @ICEGov to explain to me why they’re spending even more money on for-profit detention centers & secretly housing migrants in a facility so despicable that @TheJusticeDept didn’t want to use it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The last thing our servicemembers should have to worry about is our govt trying to deport their families. @gillibrandny & I wrote a letter urging @realDonaldTrump to think about our nat’l security & reconsider deporting undocumented families of soldiers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Según los informes, @realDonaldTrump ha ordenado a @ICEgov que comience este fin de semana redadas a familias migrantes. No importa quién sea el presidente, independientemente de su estado migratorio, usted tiene derechos. Lea y comparta esta información. #KnowYourRights

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: . @realDonaldTrump has reportedly directed @ICEgov to begin raids this weekend against thousands of migrant families. No matter who's President, regardless of your immigration status, you have rights. Read & share this info from @ACLU. #KnowYourRights

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@NLRB member William Emanuel got busted once for hearing a case where he had a conflict of interest — & he might do it again. The NLRB is supposed to protect workers & Emanuel’s mile-long list of conflicts is disqualifying. He must resign.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Let's get this straight: @ICEgov spent money it doesn't have for a secret contract to detain migrants in a facility so horrendous that @TheJusticeDept stopped using it? We need to end private prisons & detention centers, and stop the inhumane detention at the border. NOW.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m reintroducing my Climate Risk Disclosure Act with @RepCasten, @RepCartwright & @RepAOC to make public companies disclose their climate-related risks. Investors can hold corporations accountable for their role in the climate crisis & speed up the transition to a green economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s time to wake up & fight back against giant corporations that pollute our environment & make everyone else deal with the consequences. So I’ve got a bill to #ActOnClimate with the language that giant corporations understand best: money.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The #ClimateCrisis threatens our air, water, & health, but it could also trigger a global financial crisis. Rising sea levels, more extreme storms, & water shortages are just a few of the many threats to our economy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I reintroduced my Gambling Addiction Prevention Act with @SteveDaines & @RepSusieLee so servicemembers & vets struggling with gambling addiction can get the treatment they need. It's one more way we can honor their sacrifices by keeping them safe.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: There are more than 3000 slot machines at US military installations around the world, but the @DeptofDefense doesn't systematically screen for gambling disorder. That's dangerous for our servicemembers' health & well-being, & our national security. But I've got a bill for that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We should call our climate crisis what it is: an emergency. That’s why I support a climate emergency resolution, a #GreenNewDeal, protecting our public lands and coasts from drilling, and other big, bold actions to tackle it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m proud that MA & our @MassAGO Maura Healey is still leading the fight to stop the Trump administration from ripping away health care from millions of Americans. We’re in this fight all the way. #ProtectOurCare

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Health care is a basic human right, and we fight for basic human rights. That’s why I support #MedicareForAll so families don’t go broke while begging insurance companies to get the care they need.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration is in court today in their never-ending crusade to destroy health care for millions of Americans. If they succeed, families like Chantel’s would go bankrupt. People would die. #ProtectOurCare

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The facts are clear: @RealDonaldTrump’s only environmental priority is to stuff the pockets of Big Oil & Big Coal companies that deepen the #ClimateCrisis & poison our water & air.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Wall Street is lobbying policymakers to weaken the rules for their new ways to trick & trap people into debt. This time it's student debt – but we’ve seen this story before. That's why @RepKatiePorter, @RepPressley, and I have sounded the alarm.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Mayor Bill Carpenter was a true champion for the City of Brockton, & a devoted public servant. Bruce & I send our prayers to Bill’s family & the people of Brockton. We’ll be with you every step of the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I look forward to a response and hope Dr. @ScottGottliebMD will rectify his mistake & resign from his position at @Pfizer. It would send a strong message about the importance of integrity of current & former federal officials.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: As @US_FDA Commissioner, @ScottGottliebMD & I worked together on a number of public health priorities. That’s why I found his new position on the Board of drug giant @Pfizer to be such a tough pill to swallow.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I want @JPMorgan @Chase CEO Jamie Dimon to explain why his bank is reinstating harmful forced arbitration clauses, & to reconsider their plans to resume exploiting their customers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This might sound wonky, but it’s important. If @Chase unfairly charges you a $5 fee, you’re probably not going to challenge them alone in a bank-friendly arbitration process. But you might join a class action – like customers did in 2012 to recover $110M.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Forced arbitration clauses are a fancy way for companies to force customers to waive their right to go to court when they’re cheated. And @JPMorgan @Chase just snuck them back into the fine print of their credit cards.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Watch @RepJudyChu’s story & #DontLookAway. What’s happening at @DHSgov border detention facilities is inhumane.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Late Friday, @BetsyDeVosED declared open season for swindlers & crooks by quietly throwing the rules on #4profit colleges in the garbage. I won’t stop fighting to hold DeVos accountable for turning her back on students.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: During her confirmation, I asked @BetsyDeVosED if she would enforce rules that protect students from cheating #4profit schools. She hemmed & hawed & sent a terrifying message to students: you’re on your own.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @FCC should be working on behalf of American consumers, not giant telecom companies. @RepJayapal & I want @AjitPaiFCC to explain the extent to which CSRIC may be corrupted by corporate influence.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@POGOBlog found that a federal advisory panel tasked with making policy recs to the @FCC is stacked with corporate insiders. This is the definition of corruption: industry members writing the rules to benefit themselves & their rich friends.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @CFPB’s Director of the Office of Innovation was Senior Counsel at an anti-LGBTQ organization labeled as a hate-group by the @SPLCenter. @RepKatiePorter, @RepPressley & I don’t think he should have a job at the CFPB.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Whether @realDonaldTrump likes it or not, he needs Congressional authorization to wage war. That’s why I voted for @SenatorTomUdall & Senator Tim Kaine’s amdt that prohibits war with Iran without approval from Congress. Americans don’t want another war in the Middle East.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realDonaldTrump and his band of war hawks @SecPompeo & @AmbJohnBolton have brought us to the brink of war with Iran, which would have devastating consequences for the region and the world. This should terrify every American.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I wrote to @BalfourBeatty & the @USAirForce for an explanation about how Balfour Beatty was able to falsify housing maintenance logs while the Air Force looked the other way. I want answers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: But it gets worse: the @USAirForce unit that oversees privatized housing ignored at least 18 warnings from local employees about false info in @BalfourBeatty maintenance logs. I have real concerns about how the Air Force is using its oversight authorities.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@BalfourBeatty got paid millions to operate housing on America's military bases – and it systematically falsified maintenance logs to collect huge bonuses while military families lived in unsafe & unsanitary homes. It's shameful.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Let’s be clear: @realDonaldTrump’s nakedly partisan citizenship question is a scheme to undercount, underfund & dilute the political power of communities of color. Today’s SCOTUS ruling proves this isn’t over. We must keep fighting to count every single person in the #2020census.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today the Supreme Court threw up its hands & declared it can’t rein in partisan gerrymandering – can’t protect Americans’ constitutional rights to participate in their democracy equally & choose their representatives. It's a shameful blow to the functioning of our democracy.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s time for the Senate to pass the #EqualityAct to finally ban discrimination against LGBTQ people. And Congress should pass my Refund Equality Act so legally married same-sex couples can finally get the tax refunds they should have received but were denied.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today we celebrate 4 years since Obergefell v. Hodges, the landmark SCOTUS ruling for #MarriageEquality. We celebrate – but we also remember that our LGBTQ friends & family are still fighting for “equal dignity in the eyes of the law” at work, school, & in our communities.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: @USDOL Today I led my @SenateDems colleagues in urging @USDOL to reverse course on joint employer agreements. The Labor Dept should be leading the fight to protect US workers – not undermining wage-and-hour protections for our most vulnerable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Giant corporations try to shirk responsibility for following federal labor laws by using contract workers, temps, & franchises – & @USDOL is trying to help them. Their proposal to narrow the definition of “employer” would weaken workers' wage protections.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: What @realDonaldTrump's admin is doing is intentional cruelty – a deliberate attempt to destroy families and psychologically scar children. Shame on @realDonaldTrump & shame on his @SenateGOP allies who have done his bidding on these horrific policies.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We should ban for-profit detention centers & prisons. We should decriminalize migration. Parents & children shouldn’t be deemed criminals for fleeing violence or seeking a better future. And we must stop family separation & jailing children. Period.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We have a moral obligation to condemn & end the despicable human rights abuses at detention facilities under @realDonaldTrump’s orders. I won't support a bill that lets companies continue to profit off of jailing children & allows kids to remain in unlicensed facilities.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Right now, kids are locked in cages & dying in US custody, @realDonaldTrump is terrorizing communities with raids & mass deportation, & the @WhiteHouse is threatening to veto legislation if it leaves out funding for more @ICEgov detention. Congress must fight back.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m glad students cheated by shady for-profit colleges are fighting back against @BetsyDeVosED in court. If she doesn’t care about helping defrauded students, then let’s hope a federal judge will make her care.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Climate change deniers like @VP Pence may think we can bury our heads in the sand & flat-out lie that “America has the cleanest air & water in the world.” But the climate crisis is a national security threat.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: One of @HUDgov’s most important jobs is to fight housing discrimination & close the homeownership gap for people of color. Eric Blankenstein’s history of racist writings show that he is unfit for a job at HUD.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The crisis with Iran is a result of @realDonaldTrump provoking Iran’s extreme hardliners & alienating our allies. I cosponsored @SenatorTomUdall’s amdt to the defense bill that prohibits war with Iran without Congressional approval. We can't start another war in the Middle East.

Tweet: The Refund Equality Act allows same-sex couples to claim the tax refunds they earned but were denied because of who they love. Tune in to the House markup of the bill now:

Tweet: I’ll keep fighting in Washington to pass the #RaisetheWage Act, which would help ensure that all American workers, including tipped workers, make a living wage and have dignity at work.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: On #Juneteenth, we remember that our country still hasn’t made enough progress toward racial equality & justice. Voter suppression. Mass incarceration. Decades of govt discrimination to keep Black families from building wealth. We can, & must, do better.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Tweet: Massachusetts families pay an average of $20k/yr for infant center care – more than the cost of in-state public tuition at UMass. My #UniversalChildCare bill would help 100k low-income kids in MA & thousands more above the poverty line.

Name: Elizabeth Warren

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For generations, lenders have given African American & Latino families fewer loans at worse terms than similar white borrowers. Tech alone won’t fix the problem. A new analysis found that discrimination is hardwired into lending algorithms. I want answers.

Tweet: We need to padlock the revolving door between big business & government to get our democracy working for the people again. My bill to #EndCorruptionNow would force former corporate lobbyists like Charles Faulkner to take a 6-year time-out before taking a job in government.

Tweet: I love #Pride because it's a time we all come together to celebrate love. I'll never stop fighting for a world where everyone feels safe to be who they are & love who they love.

Tweet: .@BostonLogan airport workers keep us safe and get us where we need to go. I’m glad that @MassAGO is holding contractors accountable, and making sure workers are paid every penny they’ve earned.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: On #MemorialDay, we remember the brave women and men who made the ultimate sacrifice for our country. We honor them by following through on the promises we made to their families, and all those who serve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Selling more weapons to Saudi Arabia doesn't make America safer or align with our country's values. It only benefits defense contractors and @realDonaldTrump's alarming desire to sow chaos abroad. l'll do everything I can in Congress to stop it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realDonaldTrump wants to keep selling American weapons to his Saudi buddies. But he knows Congress won't approve selling to a regime that's bombed thousands of Yemeni civilians and murdered journalist Jamal Khashoggi – so he's trying to go around us.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is a despicable act of cowardice. This vandalism is meant to divide us – but I know it only strengthens the resolve of the people of Dorchester and the Commonwealth of Massachusetts to remember and honor those who made the ultimate sacrifice.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last week, @SenatorMenendez, @NydiaVelazquez & I questioned @FEMA about the delays. Now, the agency has confirmed the hospital on Vieques will be rebuilt. It's a critical win for the people of Puerto Rico – and we’ll be with them every step of the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: For nearly 2 years, 9,000 US citizens living on the island of Vieques, Puerto Rico haven't had access to a local hospital. Theirs was destroyed in Hurricane Maria, and despite promises to rebuild, @FEMA kept delaying the project.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last night, I voted for a major bipartisan disaster relief package that will help people across the country recover from natural disasters like hurricanes, flooding, and wildfires. When we work together, our nation comes out on top.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 10 years ago this week, Congress passed a bipartisan bill to help get the tricks & traps out of the fine print of credit card agreements – but the fight’s not over. We need a strong @CFPB to hold credit card companies accountable when they cheat customers & break the law.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I'm proud to cosponsor the Women’s Health Protection Act. It would #StopTheBans by enshrining Roe v. Wade into federal law – ensuring everyone in this country has access to abortion, no matter where they live. #ActForWomen

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I was wrong. It's not 5 children dead – it's SIX. The Trump Admin just disclosed a 10-yr-old girl died in federal custody last year.Are there more we don't know about? We need oversight. We need accountability. We need to do everything we can to keep this from happening again.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I stand with @AOC, @forrespect, and the 250,000 workers who lost jobs and severance pay when Wall Street fat cats @StevenMnuchin1 and Eddie Lampert gutted companies like @Sears. Together, we'll keep fighting for justice, accountability, and better futures for all.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Washington is supposed to work for everyone. Instead, the rich & powerful like @StevenMnuchin1 & Eddie Lampert use it to become even more rich & powerful, while workers are left holding the bag. This is the DC swamp at its worst.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Steven Mnuchin and his college roommate Eddie Lampert (the CEO of Sears) piled the company with debt, closed thousands of stores, and enriched themselves at the expense of workers. Now, @StevenMnuchin1 could have a say in decisions affecting @Sears.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Before @StevenMnuchin1 became Treasury Secretary, he was on the board of @Sears, where he helped gut the company and fire thousands of employees. Now, @AOC and I have some tough questions for him.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It's been 48 days since the Violence Against Women Act passed the House. But @SenateMajLdr McConnell would rather help his @NRA buddies than bring #VAWA to the floor. This is ridiculous. Women's lives are more important than gun lobbyists' wish lists.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In December I called for @DHSOIG to investigate these deaths at the border, and that review is underway. But we need answers now: why are children dying after being taken into @CBP custody and what steps is CBP taking to end this string of

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Two more immigrant children died over the past week after having been in @CBP custody. That’s five deaths in the past six months. It’s appalling. CBP owes the American people an explanation for these children’s deaths and its failure to keep them safe.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Not on my watch. I’m cosponsoring legislation to stop us from going to war with Iran. Congress must use its constitutional authority to stop @realDonaldTrump from dragging us into another forever war.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Americans are tired of reckless and endless wars. We saw what the disastrous Iraq War did. Thousands of servicemembers dead and wounded. America's reputation damaged abroad. Now @realDonaldTrump’s advisors are pushing Shock and Awe 2.0 – this time against Iran.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@SecretaryCarson can’t distinguish between a cookie and a home that’s been foreclosed on. Luckily, @RepKatiePorter was able to school him on the difference.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Republican state legislators are already stripping away women's constitutional rights. And @realDonaldTrump & @SenateGOP are making their jobs easier by appointing judges who could overturn Roe v. Wade. I'll be voting no on every one of these guys.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Kenneth Bell once argued the "indefensibility of the abortion rights position," claiming there was "no middle ground." Thanks to the @SenateGOP, he could wind up on the federal bench in North Carolina, where legislators have already considered an anti-abortion bill this year.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Carl Nichols, @realDonaldTrump's nominee to be a Judge in the District of Washington DC, argued that pharmacists should be able to deny patients access to emergency contraceptives (which they're required by law to provide) because of religious objections.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It gets worse. Stephen Clark sponsored an ad calling Roe v. Wade “BAD LAW” & comparing it to Dred Scott, a heinous Supreme Court decision that deprived Black Americans of their constitutional rights. No wonder Republicans want him on the federal bench.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Howard Nielson, nominee to be a Judge for the District of Utah, defended a highly restrictive Texas law that would have prevented countless women from accessing abortions. The Supreme Court disagreed and ultimately struck it down.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Daniel Collins argued in a brief submitted in the Hobby Lobby case that companies should be able to deny contraceptive coverage to employees. Now @SenateGOP and @realDonaldTrump want him on the Ninth Circuit.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last week, Alabama passed an extreme abortion ban in a thinly veiled attempt to overturn Roe v. Wade. This week, @SenateGOP is trying to shove through 5 judges who have spent their careers undermining women's reproductive rights. This is a full-scale attack on women's health.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s been over 24 hours. No more spoiler alerts. Here’s why @AOC and I are officially on #TeamSansa now.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Patients with mental health & substance use disorders deserve the same access to care as patients with physical health conditions, but insurance companies deny these services to cut costs. @RepJoeKennedy & I have a plan so people get the care they need.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A group of lawyers, professors & judges are about to vote on whether to subject consumers to abusive contracts they don't negotiate and can't opt out of. This dangerous proposal will shape decisions in courts across the country – it should be voted down.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I introduced this legislation to help provide tribal nations with the resources they need to combat child abuse & neglect. I’m very grateful for @NCAI1944 & @NativeChildren's support of this bill.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @CFPB and @usedgov are supposed to protect students from loan companies that break the law. But @BetsyDeVosED has given these companies the green light to ignore regulators’ oversight. Students deserve better than this.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Rising carbon dioxide levels are driving the climate crisis & threaten the safety of every American. But @SecBernhardt “hasn’t lost any sleep over it.” We need an @Interior Secretary who cares more about our environment than the profits of his former and future lobbying clients.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: These actions are meant to inspire fear in places of worship and joy. But we won’t let that happen. By coming together to stand against anti-Semitism and other forms of bigotry, our communities will only grow stronger.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Exactly 15 years after Massachusetts became the first state to legalize gay marriage, the House has passed the #EqualityAct. I'll fight to do the same in the Senate. Because LGBTQ Americans deserve to be treated equally, no matter where they live – or who they love.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Over and over again, I’ve spoken out against right-wing efforts to ban abortion. Now it's time for Congress to act. I have a plan to secure women’s access to reproductive care through federal, statutory rights that parallel Roe’s protections. Let’s #StopTheBans.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We have two separate & very unequal justice systems: one for the wealthy & well connected, & one for everyone else. Read my new essay with the @BrennanCenter on how we enforce the principle engraved on the Supreme Court: "Equal Justice Under Law."

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This student loan company is literally under investigation and being sued by states and the federal government for cheating students to make more money. But congrats on breaking into the #Fortune500, @Navient. I didn’t know they had a special section for scammers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Tomorrow is the anniversary of the landmark Brown v. Board of Education. 65 years later, Wendy Vitter, @realDonaldTrump’s pick for the LA District Court, won't say whether that case was correctly decided. The Senate must reject her nomination.#CourtsMatter

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The defense industry will inevitably have a seat at the table, but they shouldn’t get to own the table. US security & values must come ahead of private companies' profits. Congress should stand up to the military industrial complex & pass the DOD Ethics & Anti-Corruption Act.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill with @RepSpeier would:-Slam shut the revolving door between defense contractors & the Pentagon -Ban DOD officials from owning defense contractor stock-Limit foreign gov’ts from hiring former US national security officials-Increase transparency of lobbying

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our national security decisions should be driven only by what best keeps Americans safe – not by what makes the defense industry the most money. That’s why I’m introducing new legislation to loosen the stranglehold defense contractors have on the Pentagon and #EndCorruptionNow.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve said it for years: state & federal efforts to defund @PPFA, gut Title X & ban abortion are part of a deliberate, methodical, orchestrated attack on women’s rights. We’ll fight back for reproductive care – including access to safe & legal abortion – as many times as it takes.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @USOCC has the authority to review @WellsFargo's pick for a new CEO. But they didn't use it when Tim Sloan was put in charge. I got Comptroller Otting to agree to review Sloan's successor, & urged him to make that info public so Americans can hold Wells (& him) accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Alabama lawmakers have voted to effectively ban abortion in the state. We see this for what it is: a direct attack on Roe v. Wade, and on women all across this country. We will fight these attacks every step of the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We cannot let the Trump Admin drag us into yet another war in the Middle East. This is exactly why the President doesn't have the constitutional authority to declare war. That's Congress’s job – and that's why I'm supporting this legislation to prevent a war with Iran.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I support the #EqualityAct because nobody should be discriminated against for who they are or who they love – period.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: If we want to stop Wall Street banks & giant companies from cheating customers, hurting workers, & polluting our planet, we can’t sit back & do nothing. We have to hold corporate criminals accountable. I’ve introduced legislation that would do just that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: After @realDonaldTrump took office, the number of white collar crime enforcement actions pursued by the federal gov't declined to a 20-year-low. Fines and enforcement actions have dropped across nearly every agency. Cases brought by the @CFPB, SEC, & DOJ have dropped by 50%.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s already clear that our gov't is rigged in favor of the rich and powerful. But in case you need a refresher, @RepJayapal and I have a new report outlining how the Trump Admin is letting corporate criminals run rampant.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Dr. @YngvildOlsen is absolutely right. It's time to end the discrimination and fear surrounding addiction, and instead respond with courage. It's time for Congress to pass the #CAREact.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Four years ago, @DrLeanaWen came to my Senate office & trained me in the use of naloxone, the opioid overdose reversal drug. Our #CAREact includes $500 million/yr of funding to expand access to this life-saving medicine.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The biggest drug companies have made billions of dollars pushing powerful & addictive drugs that contribute to our opioid epidemic. When drug manufacturers break the law, their execs should be held personally accountable. My corporate accountability bill will make sure of it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Insys Therapeutics made a spray out of the powerful opioid fentanyl for cancer patients, illegally marketed it to people with milder pain, & bribed doctors to overprescribe it. Their former CEO John Kapoor & 4 other executives are going to jail.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m happy to fight shoulder-to-shoulder with @RepLoriTrahan for families in Central MA, the Merrimack Valley, & all across this country. Great to see everyone at #MA3InDC today!

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Long before I was a senator, I fought to keep student loans dischargeable in bankruptcy – but Congress chipped away at this critical protection. I’m glad to work with @SenatorDurbin on the Student Borrower Bankruptcy Relief Act to restore this protection.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Let’s do it! #CAREact

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@CNNBusiness let me explain (in more than 280 characters) why that @Chase tweet last week was a punch in the gut – it perpetuates the myth that irresponsible spending is the reason for Americans’ dire financial straits. (Spoiler alert: It's not.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Uber & Lyft are worth billions of dollars, but their business model depends, in part, on low wages for their drivers. I stand with ride-sharing workers who are organizing for better pay & benefits & the opportunity to bargain collectively.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congress needs to stand up to the #ChamberOfCarbon. And companies need to start walking the talk. If they really support efforts to combat climate change, they shouldn’t keep funneling money to the @USChamber while Big Oil uses it to do its dirty work.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @USChamber has spent millions since 2010 to support climate-denying Republicans. But when @SenWhitehouse and I surveyed the Chamber’s board members, not a single one would endorse the org’s anti-climate position. So where’s the money coming from?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The #CAREact is the most ambitious legislation ever introduced in Congress to confront the opioid epidemic, & that's why 200+ organizations support this bill. It’s long past time for the federal government to step up & take action.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Construction workers are 6 times more likely to die of opioid overdoses than any other job, so the #CAREact has a new grant program to help high-risk workers. I’m proud that labor groups including the @AFLCIO & @NABTU support our bill to fight this crisis.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: In Massachusetts, 1 in 4 people know someone who has died of an opioid overdose – but our communities just don’t have the resources to help everyone who needs it. Under our #CAREact, MA would receive $120.1 million to fight substance use disorders & the opioid epidemic.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 30 years ago, the Ryan White CARE Act transformed the fight against HIV/AIDS. Our new #CAREact to fight the opioid crisis is modeled on that bill – & invests $100 billion in states & local communities for prevention, treatment, & recovery services.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 130 Americans die every day from an opioid overdose. That’s like a plane crash every day. This is a public health emergency – & @RepCummings & I have a bold plan to fight it. #CAREact

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: A year ago today, the Trump admin made family separation the official policy of the US. I saw firsthand how that policy was cruelly carried out – children separated from their mothers in detention. We won't stop fighting #UntilEveryFamilyIsReunited.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Enough is enough. Credit reporting agencies like @Equifax collect our information without our permission. If they allow that information to get stolen, they need to be held accountable. My colleagues & I urged the @FTC & the @CFPB to do just that.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@Equifax didn’t just allow the breach to happen. It also initially refused to come clean with the public & help consumers protect themselves. And according to a new Congressional report, the company is STILL failing consumers months later.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@Equifax let hackers steal personal info from almost 150 million Americans. If this bill had been the law before the breach, the company would have paid at least $1.5 billion in fines, half of which would have gone straight back to affected consumers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It’s been nearly 2 years since the #EquifaxBreach – & Congress still hasn’t acted to protect consumers or prevent the next breach. So @MarkWarner @RepCummings, @CongressmanRaja & I are reintroducing a bill to impose massive, mandatory fines when companies expose personal data.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: You and I both took an oath, @SenateMajLdr McConnell. To defend the Constitution of the United States – not to protect @realDonaldTrump. Congress must consider the evidence provided in the Mueller Report and hold the President accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I grew up to be a teacher, then a senator – in no small part because of Mrs. Lee, my 2nd grade teacher. She opened the door to a world of opportunity for me. If we want to invest in brighter futures for our kids, we must invest more in our teachers today. #TeacherAppreciationWeek

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Home care workers deserve higher wages, better benefits, and stronger collective bargaining rights. But the Trump Admin is trying to roll back their rights. I'm in this fight with #homecare workers – and the Americans who rely on their care – all the way.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Murder rates for Native women & girls are horrifyingly high. This is a crisis. On National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls, we renew our commitment to reauthorizing the Violence Against Women Act, & ending this epidemic of violence. #MMIWG

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My plan to #EndCorruptionNow would stop senior govt officials from leaving & immediately getting paid by firms they gave contracts to. I’ll keep fighting to make that law. In the meantime, Kelly should try & save what’s left of his reputation by resigning from Caliburn’s board.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: John Kelly oversaw many of the Trump Admin's most morally repugnant immigration policies. Now he could be making big bucks serving on the Board of a company that's profiting from the same cruel plans he put in place. This is corruption at its absolute worst.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Construction workers are some of the toughest people I know, but the back-breaking work means too many get hurt, become addicted to opioids & die of overdoses. I'm grateful that the MA Building Trades are tackling this crisis. We're in this fight together.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congress may not have the courage yet to pass real gun reforms – but @GabbyGiffords has plenty of courage to spare. Grateful for @GiffordsCourage’s leadership and tireless efforts to #EndGunViolence, and to be with Gabby in this fight. We can do this, together.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The FTC should investigate if hiding Free File is unfair & deceptive, and if the companies colluded to rip off taxpayers. And IRS should end its agreements with them & get refunds for taxpayers who paid for services because of these abuses.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It gets worse: A @propublica report & an investigation by my office found that nearly half of the IRS’s Free File companies hide the free option in online search results & direct people to paid products instead. It’s unfair & deceptive.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The IRS’s Free File program claims to provide free tax prep services to 70% of taxpayers. But only 3% of eligible taxpayers use it because the companies trick people into purchasing unnecessary products. (That’s why I’ve got a plan to overhaul it.)

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The private firms that own & operate military housing are cutting corners to make a profit on the homes of four-star generals. What do you think they’re doing to the homes of junior enlisted? That’s why @RepDebHaaland & I have a plan to fix it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We must be vigilant about the threat of terrorism, but no one believes that there is a military-only solution in Afghanistan. We need an economic & diplomatic plan with our allies for safety & stability in the region. And it’s time to bring our troops home — now.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Trump administration owes it to the American people & our service members to define what winning is in Afghanistan & how we achieve that goal. The evidence is abundantly clear: this administration has no plan.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today I’m reintroducing the US Territorial Relief Act to give US territories like Puerto Rico a route to comprehensive debt relief & a chance to get back on their feet. Our fellow US citizens are counting on us, & we cannot forget them.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Now, post-Maria, Puerto Rico faces a much bigger crisis. Rebuilding efforts in Puerto Rico are still slow, & the debt is a big reason why. Few investors want to put money into reconstruction if the debt means the island doesn’t have a realistic chance of recovering.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Puerto Rico was in crisis long before Hurricanes Maria & Irma tore through the island. For years, Puerto Rico has been at the mercy of Wall Street vulture funds that snapped up the island’s crushing debt to squeeze the Puerto Rican people for every penny they can get.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: On Yom Hashoa, #WeRemember the 6 million Jews and millions of others who were murdered in the Holocaust. We honor their memories by speaking out and confronting anti-Semitism, bigotry, and hate – wherever we find it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our military families deserve high-quality housing. I’ve introduced the Military Housing Oversight & Service Member Protection Act to help fix the private housing program's shortcomings & eliminate the corner-cutting & neglect by providers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The failure of private housing companies to meet basic standards for military housing is unacceptable. My office conducted an investigation of the private housing program & found a series of problems in the structure, administration, & oversight.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My friend @maziehirono always speaks truth to power. 🔥 Thanks to @JudiciaryDems for asking the tough questions.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The Attorney General does not swear an oath of loyalty to any one individual. The AG swears an oath of loyalty to the Constitution of the United States. Barr has made clear that he doesn't swear his loyalty that way & that disqualifies him from being AG. He should resign.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Sending my best wishes to Rutland’s own Drew Pescaro & all of the victims of the tragic shooting at UNC Charlotte yesterday. Stay strong, Drew. #drewstrong

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Earlier this month, @SenJackReed & I urged the @USGAO to investigate the national security risks posed by climate change to the @DeptofDefense supply chain. I’m pleased that the GAO accepted our request.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This morning I sent a letter to the @DHSOIG requesting an investigation into how @DHSgov obtained surveillance data from family separation protests & how DHS officials & law enforcement agencies have used that information. I want answers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today, my friend @AdyBarkan is testifying in the House about why we need #MedicareForAll. He makes a powerful case for why health care is a human right. Read it here: https://t.co/HpOYN1RiO2

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@Chase: why aren’t customers saving money?Taxpayers: we lost our jobs/homes/savings but gave you a $25b bailoutWorkers: employers don’t pay living wagesEconomists: rising costs + stagnant wages = 0 savingsChase: guess we’ll never knowEveryone: seriously? #MoneyMotivation

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: It is not a crime to attend a peaceful rally against this admin’s horrific family separation policy – in fact, I joined thousands of people at the Families Belong Together protest in Boston. The @DHSgov IG should investigate this serious abuse of power.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy to celebrate a big conservation victory: the official designation of the Nashua River system as National Wild & Scenic Rivers. Thank you @RepLoriTrahan & Niki Tsongas for leading this fight to protect the Nashua, Squannacook, & Nissitissit Rivers at the federal level.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Last year, 69 workers in Massachusetts died on the job. On #WorkersMemorialDay, we honor their memory, and the millions of workers across the country who are hurt or killed at work each year. I’ll keep fighting for protections to ensure every worker is safe on the job.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The tragedy at the Chabad of Poway synagogue was an attack on the Jewish community — not just in Poway, but everywhere. We will not be divided by hate & fear. An attack on one of us is an attack on all of us.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 70% of adults who misuse prescription opioids get them from friends or family. I passed a bipartisan bill that lets patients partially fill opioid prescriptions. By disposing of unused medication on #TakeBackDay, you can help fight the #OpioidEpidemic. Find a collection site:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today on her birthday, we remember Coretta Scott King, a civil rights hero who dedicated her life to the fight for racial & economic justice. On the floor of the Senate & all across this country, we won't let anyone silence her powerful voice.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Great news for Massachusetts families & terrible news for the @NRA! I’m deeply grateful for @MassAGO Maura Healey’s courageous work to stand up to the gun lobby & keep weapons of war off our streets. MA is a leader in gun safety & the federal govt should follow its example.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My affordable housing bill would help start to close the wealth gap between Black & white families caused by decades of housing discrimination by helping first-time homebuyers in formerly redlined or officially segregated areas.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: We cannot ignore the history of housing discrimination in this country & its lasting impact on African American families. I'm very glad that the @TheBACBoston has taken on this powerfully important subject.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’m very glad that a federal judge blocked @realDonaldTrump's unlawful scheme to attack the #TitleX family planning program. Judge Bastian is right: this administration's rule “creates unreasonable barriers for patients to obtain appropriate medical care.”

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve got a plan that would force housing providers to clean up their act. @RepDebHaaland & I are introducing legislation to increase oversight & transparency, & give military families greater rights to ensure their homes are safe. It's what they deserve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Our military families deserve safe, clean housing. But some are living with mice, mold, or lead paint. Why? Because the private companies that build and maintain these homes are padding their own pockets instead of serving military families – and DoD hasn't held them accountable.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: This is a big win for coastal communities and our environment – but the Trump Admin never should have pushed to expand offshore drilling to begin with. It’s time for @SecBernhardt to bury this plan once and for all.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I’ve spent years fighting back against shady for-profit colleges, & the officials & organizations that enable them to defraud students & taxpayers.We should ban for-profit colleges from sucking down federal dollars.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Too many Americans are being crushed by student debt. Our government should be investing in creating opportunities for people like Alexis and Akilah, not grinding them down even further.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The first bill I introduced in the Senate was to slash the interest rate on federal student loans to the same deal the big banks got. For years, I’ve been pushing ways to roll back student loan debt because students don't have an army of lobbyists & lawyers.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The #2020census must count every single person. Our Constitution demands it. Our democracy requires it. By adding an unnecessary citizenship question, @realDonaldTrump and @SecretaryRoss are fanning the flames of hate and bigotry and jeopardizing the Census’ accuracy. It’s wrong.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Student loan debt was the first fight I picked when I got to the Senate – because if we drown our students in debt, we drown this country’s future.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Let’s recognize #EarthDay by stating the simple facts:🔬 We believe in science.🏝 We know the climate crisis is happening.🚫 We aren’t doing enough to #ActOnClimate. It's time for big, bold action. It's time for a #GreenNewDeal.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Long before I ever came within a hundred miles of politics, I was a teacher. I just wanted every kid to get a chance to build something. That’s why I’ve fought so hard to end the student debt crisis & invest in opportunities for America’s young people:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congratulations to @UFCW and the 31,000 @StopandShop workers who are back on the job today after striking to secure fair wages, health and retirement benefits for workers. When we fight together, we win.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I believe there is God in each and every one of us. I believe the Lord calls on us to act. And that when we do act, the Lord will give us the strength we need. Wishing a Happy Easter to all those celebrating today.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Space Force won’t increase our competitive advantage in space, or make America any safer. It’s just another layer of military bureaucracy that we’ll have to pour buckets of money into. I think taxpayers deserve better.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: When disaster strikes, everyone should get the help they need. But the evidence shows this isn’t always the case. @BennieGThompson & I want @USGAO to review how disaster aid programs may worsen inequality in our country so we can do something about it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My oldest brother was career Air Force, so I know how much servicemembers contribute even after they retire – and that deserves special thanks. I worked to pass a bipartisan resolution designating today as Military Retiree Appreciation Day to recognize their continued service.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The AG is supposed to serve as the country’s top law enforcement officer – someone who stands up for the rule of law & defends the US Constitution against all enemies, foreign or domestic.William Barr is standing up for only one person: the President of the United States.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: .@realDonaldTrump’s cruel immigration policies are filling detention centers, many of which are run by private companies that are raking in taxpayer dollars. Some of the conditions are appalling and there's zero accountability. @ICEgov needs to own up to this and fix it – now.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The @BostonGlobe is right: “It’s time to create a government-run TurboTax-like service, provide a return-free option for taxpayers, and end the Tax Day rip-off from these companies.” And I’ve got the bill to do it.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Congress passed a bipartisan bill to stop US support for Saudi Arabia’s war in Yemen. @realDonaldTrump has just vetoed it. We can’t keep writing the Saudis blank checks. It's time to end our complicity in this humanitarian crisis – I’ll keep on fighting to get it done.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Title X provides basic health care services like birth control, cancer screenings, & HIV testing for millions of Americans. I’m in this fight to protect & expand Title X funding all the way. #ProtectX

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Thank YOU for leading this fight, @tressiemcphd! We make each other stronger.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Dr. @tressiemcphd has spent years studying how for-profit colleges prey on the poor, women, & people of color – sucking down taxpayer dollars & loading up students with debt for useless degrees, while Wall Street rakes in the cash. I just think that’s fundamentally wrong.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The fact remains: Military student loan borrowers overpaid $100M+ in student loan interest charges because of @usedgov & @DeptofDefense’s lack of communication. Service members & veterans should receive refunds for interest they never owed, but paid anyway.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I successfully included a provision in the 2018 @DeptofDefense budget authorization to automate service members' student loan benefits. I’m very glad DoD proposed an agreement with @usedgov this week to ensure military student loan borrowers receive the benefits they’re owed.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Active duty service members in war zones are supposed to be exempt from paying any interest on their federal student loans. But hundreds – if not thousands – of military borrowers did not see that benefit due to bureaucratic obstacles at @DeptofDefense & @usedgov.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: David Bernhardt should have never been confirmed to lead @Interior with a slew of outstanding ethics complaints. I'm glad the Department's watchdog has now agreed to investigate. Bernhardt's supposed to protect our public lands, not his business

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Months ago, I called for an investigation into David Bernhardt's work at @Interior to weaken important water and wildlife protections that benefited his former lobbying clients. But the Senate still voted to confirm him last week, despite his blatant conflicts of interest.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: That means if you paid one dollar in taxes on #TaxDay, you paid more than Amazon, Chevron, and Eli Lilly – combined. When giant corporations contribute nothing while hard-working families pay their fair share, that’s a rigged system.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Corporations spent millions of dollars and sent armies of lobbyists to push for the #GOPTaxScam. The result? A tax code so full of loopholes that dozens of giant companies paid nothing on #TaxDay.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Over the last 60 years, corporations have paid less and less in taxes, while working families foot the bill for critical government services. This #TaxDay, it’s time to ask who this country works for.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Today we remember the victims of the #BostonMarathon tragedy, & we honor them with a new Boston tradition: #OneBostonDay. It’s a day for random acts of kindness to celebrate Bostonians' strength & the generosity that people showed us from around the world. How will you celebrate?

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Happy Patriots’ Day, Massachusetts – and good luck to everyone running in the #BostonMarathon! Our Commonwealth & our country are cheering for you today.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: My bill would let millions of Americans simply sign and return a pre-filled tax form, and require the IRS to create a free online tax preparation and filing service – making #TaxDay easier and cheaper for everyone.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Every year, taxpayers waste too much time and money on tax preparation. And low-income and minority taxpayers are hit the hardest, according to a new report that @SenDuckworth and I requested:

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Filing your taxes is complicated and expensive. But it doesn’t have to be that way. Congress should pass my Tax Filing Simplification Act, which I’m re-introducing today.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: 31k New England @StopandShop workers just went on strike for a contract that provides fair wages, good benefits, & a secure retirement. I stand in solidarity with @UFCW for these hard-working families to be treated with the dignity & respect they deserve.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: I can’t believe it took you 3 hours and 15 minutes to learn Rule #1, @stevenmnuchin1: don’t tell @RepMaxineWaters how to conduct her committee.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Health care is a basic human right, & we fight for basic human rights. I'm happy to once again co-sponsor #MedicareForAll with @SenSanders.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Cities like Boston & Framingham are tackling the housing crisis head-on, but the federal govt must do more to help invest in affordable housing & reverse the legacy of housing discrimination. I’m with @marty_walsh & @Mayor_Spicer — let’s do this.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: The American people need to see the FULL report, Mr. Barr.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Wyrick helped grease the skids for Big Oil when he worked for Pruitt back in Oklahoma. And his *very brief* experience on the bench indicates he’ll keep working to roll back key environmental protections. A vote for him is a vote against a clean and safe planet for our kids.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: Remember how former @EPA Secretary Scott Pruitt was forced to resign after umpteen ethics scandals? Well now his protégé, 38-year-old Patrick Wyrick, is on the verge of being confirmed to a lifetime position as a federal judge.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
Tweet: MA has led the country in protecting & promoting equality, from marriage equality to transgender rights. I’m proud we're leading again by banning the despicable practice of conversion therapy for kids, & I’ll keep fighting for a ban at the federal level.

Name: Elizabeth Warren
